text: OVERHEAD SHOT: A `79 Cobra winds alongside the Missouri River, past swaying loosestrife, vibrant sugar maples, an oily self-pump gas stations. A hazy sun glints off the ho of the Cobra which, like its descendant the Milano, is or and teal.

We MOVE DOWN AND IN on a fresh-faced girl of 18 in the passenger seat: MEREDITH QUILL. As "Brandy" blasts from t car stereo, she pushes her fine, feathered hair from her mouth, and sings along, out-of-tune -
Do do do do do do do do do do do!
The driver, a MYSTERIOUS MAN in his 30's, dressed in slee mod attire, LAUGHS.
Meredith LAUGHS too. She SINGS and dances with abandon in her seat. She's a lively goofball, and it's apparent wher Peter Quill received much of his personality.
The Cobra pulls beside this Dairy Queen in a desolate are
The Mysterious Man helps Meredith down the steep hillside into the woods. "Brandy" continues to play on the car ste in the lot behind them. Meredith GIGGLES.
This way, my river lily.
Where are you taking me?
The Mysterious Man shows her a STRANGE SPROUT nestled amo the trees.
A few inches tall and decidedly alien in nature, its deli limbs twist and turn in a complex pattern.
Oh. It's beautiful.
The Mysterious Man looks proudly at Meredith. With a perpetually excited glint in his eye, and the air of a se empowerment guru, he is an intoxicating presence.
I was afraid it wouldn't take to the soil, but it rooted quickly.
He nods toward the sky between the branches above.
Soon it will be everywhere - all across the universe, fulfilling life's one true purpose.
Which is what?
Expansion.
The Mysterious Man takes her in his arms.    He gazes int eyes. She grows almost teary.
I'm not sure what you're talking about. But I like the way you say it.
My heart is yours, Meredith Quill.
I can't believe I fell in love with a spaceman.
And they KISS, with passion, and love. "DO DO DO DO DO DO DO DO DO DO!" sings Looking Glass as SOURCE BECOMES SCORE we TILT DOWN to the plant. It TWITCHES AND GROWS AND TWIS

We PUSH IN ON IT, where we see the plant is made, not onl cellulose and leaves, but of a BRIGHT COSMIC LIGHT. And w KEEPING PUSHING IN, INTO THE PLANT ITSELF, more FLESH-LIK than you'd imagine, where COLORFUL BACTERIA OVERCOMES US "BRANDY" DISTORTS AND TRANSFORMS into something epic.

head_text.subj: O.S. A CRACK OF INTERDIMENSIONAL THUNDER

text: SUPER: 34 Years Later
An artificial, golden planet, made of interlocking orbs, revolves around a blue sun.
We PUSH IN on THUNDEROUS INTERDIMENSIONAL CRACKS on one s patch of planet.
A DIMENSIONAL CRACK SNAPS in the sky overhead. PETER QUIL looks from it to an old MATTEL ELECTRONICS FOOTBALL GAME converted into a tracker. A RED DOT APPROACHES.
Showtime, a-holes! It'll be here any minute!
Which will be its loss.

Quill turns toward GAMORA, loading a rifle. DRAX, ROCKET, and BABY GROOT also ready themselves for battle in this grand, open-air power station. Dozens of BATTERIES are couched in conductor towers encircling them. Quill, Gamor and Rocket wear flying rigs.
Is that a rifle?
You don't know what a rifle is?
I thought your thing was a sword.
We've been hired to stop an interdimensional beast from feeding on those batteries' energy, and I'm going to stop it with a sword?
(mumbling to himself) Don't look at me like I'm stupid. You're the one being all inconsistent.
A LOUDER, LARGER CRACK: something seems to be fighting it way through the sky.
Drax, why aren't you wearing one of Rocket's aero-rigs?
It hurts.
Hurts?
I have sensitive nipples.
Rocket, who is working on a pair of speakers wired to Qui Walkman, LAUGHS HARD at this. Drax points at him.
What about him?! What's he doing?!
If I finish this, we can listen to tunes while we work.
How is that a priority?
Blame Quill! He's the one who loves music so much!
I agree with Drax. It's hardly important right now.
Oh, sure, okayyyy, Quill.
Rocket WINKS at him.
No, I really agree with him.
Sure, I know.
Rocket WINKS some more.
I can clearly see you winking.
Damn. I'm using my left eye?
Rocket hears a small GROWL.
He looks down and sees Baby Groot - newly unpotted, only inches tall or so - angrily THROWING ASIDE some foraging Orloni. Then he looks up at Rocket, explaining:
I am Groot.
They were not looking at you funny.

Rocket swirls as a GIGANTIC BEAST - a hundred-foot-long Lovecraftian monstrosity - BREAKS THROUGH THE INTERDIMENSIONAL RIFT. THE ABILISK is the color of a pink mouse with kaleidoscopic and deadly SPLATTER MATTER pulsi from its maw.
Well. That's intense.
Rocket, Quill, and Gamora JET-PACK OUT OF THE WAY, while BLAST at the creature. Drax HOLLERS, CHARGING it with his twin blades. Quill TURNS ON his mask.
But we FOCUS on baby Groot, who trots up to the stereo speakers and Walkman.
He fiddles with two wires. They SPARK, the stereo POWERS and "MR. BLUE SKY" by ELECTRIC LIGHT ORCHESTRA PLAYS as -
Baby Groot DANCES IN-FOCUS in the foreground as the Guard get PUMMELED by the beast OUT-OF-FOCUS in the background.
Baby Groot's dancing is arrhythmic and many of his "dance moves" are nonsensical mixtures of trembling, swaying, an making weird faces.
But it is joyous.
As Groot struts, Quill comes ROLLING behind him. As he stands, he sees Groot dancing and looks at him, worried.
Groot, look - !
A TENTACLE FLIES IN FROM OFF-SCREEN, KNOCKING Quill OUT-O FRAME as Groot dances on, blissfully unaware.
Groot, smiling, dances onward, as DRAX, in the clutches o giant tentacle, is SLAMMED NUMEROUS TIMES BESIDE HIM.
Groot arrives at GAMORA, who is blasting at the OFF-SCREE BEAST.
Get out of the way, Groot! You're going to get hurt!
Groot stops dancing.    He WAVES at her.
Hi.
She AERO-JETS back into the fray.
As Groot DANCES, Drax FALLS directly behind him.
Groot FREEZES.
Drax stares at him a moment, suspicious. Groot stays froz
Drax LEAVES, and Groot COMMENCES THE DANCE where he left
Groot sees an INSECT FLYING BY.
Suddenly dancing is forgotten and GETTING THIS BUG is all important. He CHASES it.
He HOPS up and grabs it from the air...
And starts EATING it.
Rocket spots this and FLIES DOWN beside him, worried. He PRIES OPEN GROOT'S MOUTH with his fingers, frantically tr to get it out.
Spit it out! Spit it out!
Groot COUGHS IT OUT. The bug FLIES crookedly away, one wi mulched.
Rocket JETS OFF back toward the battle, muttering:
Disgusting.
Groot sees something else and becomes furious. We follow line of sight to a GRAZING ORLONI.
Groot SCREAMS A WAR CRY and ATTACKS IT. He GROWS HIS BRANCHES AROUND IT, and the terrified Orloni DARTS AWAY, DRAGGING GROOT WITH IT.
Groot's anger becomes panic as he is DRAGGED AROUND BY TH ORLONI and can't let go.
The Orloni DARTS around the power station and underneath RAGING BATTLE, a CRYING Groot bouncing along behind it.
Finally, he LETS GO and goes TUMBLING, ROLLING directly I THE CAMERA.
And then stands up and, as if none of it happened at all, starts DANCING AGAIN.
We PAN and see the speakers and Walkman beside him, and w realize Baby Groot has traveled around the entire Power Station and has arrived back where he started -
When Drax is FLUNG by the beast into the stereo system, SMASHING it.
Groot stops dancing. Angry that Drax has ruined his fun, picks up a piece of the stereo and beats him with it.
Drax stands and glares at the ferocious beast as Rocket, Quill, and Gamora BLAST at it without effect.
The beast's hide is too thick to be pierced from the outside. I must cut through it from the inside.
Huh?
Drax HOLLERS, CHARGING the creature.
Drax, no! That doesn't make -
The creature OPENS ITS ENORMOUS MOUTH, SCREECHING, and Dr LEAPS INSIDE IT, instantly swallowed up.
What is he doing?!
He said the skin is too thick to be pierced from the outside, so he --
That doesn't make sense!
I tried to tell -- !
Its skin is the same thickness from the inside as from the out!
I REALIZE THAT.
Drax HOLLERS as he SLASHES AWAY inside the goo of the bea stomach. To no avail.
Quill reloads his pistol, thinking.
Gamora, there's a cut on its neck - Rocket, get it to look up.
Quill and Rocket JET UP HIGH up over the creature as they BLAST REPEATEDLY at it.
Hey, you giant Sea Monkey, up here!
Gamora's rifle is jammed.    She tosses it down.   PULLS SWORD. SNAPS IT OPEN.
The beast SCREECHES at Quill and Rocket FLYING overhead. colorful SPLATTER MATTER FLIES FROM ITS MOUTH, BATTERING ROCKET, BURNING his clothes.
But its neck is exposed, where the skin is thinner, and t is a small wound.
Gamora DASHES, LEAPING HIGH into the air, and she PLUNGES sword directly into the wound.
She holds tight to the hilt as she FALLS, SLICING AN INCI down the length of the creature's neck.
The beast WOBBLES, TOPPLES, and DIES. As it COLLAPSES, Dr SPILLS OUT of the wound. He raises his arms in victory.
Ha ha! I have single-handedly vanquished the beast!
Quill SCOFFS. Rocket SNORTS. Gamora stares at him, dead-e Baby Groot throws a rock at him.
What?
The Guardians de-rig by the Anulax batteries.
What are they called again?
Anulax batteries.
Harbulary batteries.
That's nothing like what I just said. But they're worth thousands of units a piece. Which is why the Sovereign hired us to protect them.
Rocket pulls out one of the ANULAX BATTERIES, checking it out.
Gamora, Drax, and Quill walk on. Rocket stays back a mome Quill nods down the walkway, where GOLDEN SOVEREIGN CITIZ stand at the edge of the station, gawking.
Just be careful what you say around these folks. They're easily offended and the cost of transgression is death.
Sounds judgmental for a bunch of golden morons.
That's the kind of thing you might want to keep to yourself.
I'll hold my tongue, as long as they deliver what was promised.
An enormous golden palace in the shape of a globe, dapple morning sunlight.
We thank you, Guardians, for putting your life on the line. We could not risk the lives of our own Sovereign citizens.
HIGH PRIESTESS AYESHA is stunningly beautiful with golden skin. Her CHAMBERMAIDS and other DENIZENS flutter through her luxurious lair, all of whom are equally perfect.
Every citizen is born exactly as designed by the community, impeccable, both physically and mentally. We control the DNA of our progeny, germinating them in birthing pods.
I guess I prefer making people the old-fashioned way.
Well... perhaps someday you could give me a history lesson in the archaic ways of our ancestors... for academic purposes.
Yeah, I mean, if it's for research that could be pretty --
Quill sees Gamora staring at him.
Pretty repulsive. I'm not into that kind of casual -
Oh, please.
Your people promised something in trade for our services. Bring it and we shall gladly be on our way.
Ayesha nods.
Two SOLDIERS emerge with A WOMAN in a hood and cloak, her wrists bound by SHACKLES. They SHOVE HER TO HER KNEES and yank back her hood, REVEALING --
NEBULA. Her clothes are tattered.    Her hand is now just tech metal claw.
She glares at Gamora. Gamora glares at her. Quill looks f one to the other, feeling the tension.
Family reunion. Yaaaay.
I understand she is your sister?
Gamora roughly picks Nebula up, starts to go.
She's worth no more to me than the bounty due for her on Xandar.
Our soldiers apprehended her attempting to steal the batteries. Do with her as you please.
Thank you, High Priestess Ayesha.
Quill starts to go.
What is your heritage, Mr. Quill?
Quill turns back towards her, uncomfortable with the question.
My mother is from earth.
And your father?
He's... not from Missouri, that's all I know.
Ayesha stares at him as if she's eaten something foul.
I see it within you, an unorthodox genealogy. A hybrid that seems particularly... reckless.
Quill tries not to let this affect him, but it does. Rock grins a huge, fake grin at Ayesha.
You know, they told me you people were conceited douchebags. But that isn't true at all.
Rocket turns to Quill and WINKS.   The Guardians shift uncomfortably.
Oh, shit, I'm using my wrong eye again, aren't I?
I'm sorry. That was meant to be behind your back.
Drax YANKS Rocket away.
Gamora and Quill head out of the lair. Drax and Rocket ar few paces behind.
Count yourself blessed they didn't kill you.
You're telling me. You wanna buy some batteries?
Rocket grins and shows Drax something hidden in his bag - ANULAX BATTERIES.
"LAKE SHORE DRIVE" by ALIOTTA, HAYNES, AND JEREMIAH PLAYS
Drax LAUGHS. Rocket SHUSHES him so Quill and Gamora don't hear.
The Milano RISES into the blue sunset over the Sovereign Space Dock filled with golden, capsule-shaped ships.
Rocket works the controls as they rise up. He speaks into
Let's get baldy back to Xandar and retrieve that bounty!
Groot lies on the rear window peering out the back as the pass overhead.
On the CASSETTE PLAYER AWESOME MIX VOL. 2 is playing; we away from it, MOVING IN on Quill, looking perturbed as he takes off his jacket.
Gamora is nearby, putting shackles on Nebula.
You all right?
That stuff about my father. Who does she think she is?
I know you're sensitive about that.
I'm not sensitive about it. I just don't know who he is.
Gamora nods.
Sorry if it looked like I was flirting with her. I wasn't.
I don't care if you were.
Gamora pushes Nebula to the rear of the craft.
I think you do care. That's why I'm apologizing.
Quill watches her go, somewhat longingly.
Gamora is not the one for you, Quill.
Quill is startled to see Drax directly beside him.
There are two types of beings in the universe. Those who dance, and those who do not.
Uh huh.
I first met my beloved at a war rally.
Everyone in the village flailed about, dancing. Except one woman. My Ovette. I knew immediately she was the one.
Quill nods, trying to be polite.
The most melodic song in the world could be playing, and she wouldn't even tap her foot. She wouldn't move a muscle. One might assume she was dead.
Well, that is pretty hot, but--
It would make my nether regions
All right, okay, fascinating, don't need to hear it. I get your point, I'm a dancer and Gamora is not.
Drax smiles kindly, clutches Quill's shoulder.
You just need to find a woman who is pathetic, like you.
At the rear of the ship, Gamora roughly restrains Nebula. Nebula notices a bowl of fruit.
I am hungry. Hand me some of that yaro root.
No. It's not ripe yet. And I hate you.
You hate me?! You left me there while you stole that stone for yourself. Yet here you stand, a hero, a Garden of the Galaxy!
A what?
Nebula stares at her, confused.
`Guardians of the Galaxy.'
Oh.
Why would we be `the Gardens of the Galaxy'?
I don't know. I thought it was stupid.
Yeah, it would be.
It's still wordy.
I wasn't the one who thought of it.
Your name doesn't matter. I'll be free of these shackles soon enough, and I'll kill you, I swear.
No. You'll live out your days in a prison on Xandar, wishing you could.
Gamora MOVES UP from the stairs. Rocket and Quill are in pilot seats. Drax is moving up from the back.
We got an armed Sovereign fleet, approaching from the rear.
Gamora takes the center seat, sees a REARVIEW SCAN:
Golden, capsule-shaped, Sovereign OMNICRAFT, with a video screen on front and a blaster on each side - getting clos
Why would they do that?!
Probably because Rocket stole some of their batteries.
Quill and Gamora look at Rocket, astounded.    Rocket gaw Drax, betrayed.
Dude.
Oh, right. He didn't steal one of those. I don't know why they're after us. What a mystery this is.

head_text.subj: THE SOVEREIGN FIRE UPON THE MILANO.

text: Quill does his best to evade their blasts.
What were you thinking?!
Dude, it was really easy to steal.
That's your defense?
Come on. You saw how that high- priestess talked down to us! I'm teaching her a lesson!
Oh! I didn't realize your motivation was altruism. A shame the Sovereign have mistaken your intentions and are trying to kill us.
Exactly.
I WAS BEING SARCASTIC!
Oh no! You tricked me! You're supposed to use a sarcastic voice! Now I look foolish!
Drax points at Rocket and LAUGHS at him.
SHUT UP, DRAX! You knew! You should have told us!
Drax is aghast. He looks at Rocket.
Did you tell him it was easy to steal?
Are you kidding me?
What?
You never listen to anything!
None of you listens! Can we please just put the bickering on hold until after we survive the massive space battle?!
Rocket glances at Quill, nodding back at Gamora.
Whoa. Somebody woke up on the wrong side of the bed this morning.
Do not try to bro down with me right now, dude. I will fricking punch you in your fricking face.
Real nice! Resorting to violence.
More incoming!
MORE SHIP FLY AT THEM from the front.
GOOD! I WANT TO KILL SOME GUYS!
They twist and turn between the oncoming ships as ROCKET FIRES AT THEM, SCREAMING. They EXPLODE.
On the front of the Sovereign ships is the VIDEO IMAGE OF PILOT.
Bloody hell!
The same SOVEREIGN PILOT sits in a REMOTE POD. On a SCREE front of her we see ROCKET FIRING.
The SHIP IS HIT and the SCREEN GOES STATIC.
The Pilot SHOUTS in anger, like a kid who lost at a video game.
High Priestess Ayesha surveys from a walkway above; ROWS PODS containing PILOTS, all flying their Omnicraft remote
You're not killing anyone. Those ships are all remotely piloted.
A SOVEREIGN ADMIRAL is beside Ayesha.
What is the delay, Admiral?
High Priestess, if we destroy their craft, we risk destroying the batteries. They're extraordinarily combustible and could, in turn, destroy the entire fleet.
We have thousands of batteries and thousands of ships. Our concern is their slight against our people. We hired them and they steal from us? It is heresy of the highest order.
The Admiral speaks into his comm.
All command modules -
A FRIGHTENED SOVEREIGN PILOT, on the outskirts of the bat hears the Admiral in his headset.
Fire with the intent to kill.
A MEAN SOVEREIGN PILOT, FIRING at the Milano, smirks.
THE MILANO'S WING IS STRUCK.   The EMERGENCY SYSTEMS FLAS
What's the closest habitable planet?
Gamora dances her fingers over the UNIVERSAL NEURAL TELEPORTATION NETWORK, clicking through "jump points" unt she finds one.
It's called Berhert.
How many jumps?
Only one. But the access point is 47 clicks away. And it's through that Quantum Asteroid Field over there.
Quill spots, to his side, a HUGE FIELD OF SMALL, GLOWING

head_text.subj: ASTEROIDS, SWIRLING IN RANDOM PATTERNS, DISAPPEARING OUT

text: SPACE and EMERGING AGAIN a few feet or a few yards away.
Quill ZOOMS SIDEWAYS toward the field.
Quill, to make it through that, you'd have to be the greatest pilot in the universe.
Quill smirks.
Lucky for us -
I am.
Rocket FLIPS the pilot controls between them so that he's one piloting the ship. Quill gapes at him.
The Milano DIVES into the QUANTUM ASTEROID FIELD, SWOOPIN and around the SWIRLING ATOMIZED STONES, barely missing t
The Sovereign ships FOLLOW. They are not pilots on par wi Rocket, so most of the ships are immediately PELTED WITH STONES AND DESTROYED.
One after another the SOVEREIGN PILOTS screens go blank, they FALL BACK, angry and upset.
PUSH IN on Ayesha, barely containing her fury.
Quill FLIPS the controls back, so he's piloting again.
What are you doing?!
I've been flying this rig since I was ten years old.
I was cybernetically engineered to pilot a spacecraft!
Rocket FLIPS the controls back to him.
You were cybernetically engineered to be a douchebag.
Quill FLIPS the controls back to him.
Stop it!

Quill, later on tonight you're gonna lay down in your bed and there's gonna be something squishy in your pillowcase and you're gonna be, like, `what's this?' and it's gonna be because I put a turd in there.
Rocket FLIPS the switch back.
You put your turd in my bed, I shave you.
Oh it won't be my turd, it will be Drax's.
Drax LAUGHS cheerfully. Gamora glances at him. He explain
I have famously huge turds.
We're about to die, and this is what we're discussing?
They raise havoc with the pipes. That's why I do all the plumbing. I take responsibility for my actions. Unlike some people...
Drax eyes baby Groot.
Groot, he's right, you have to start aiming inside the box.
Groot looks ashamed. Quill FLIPS the controls back.
Stop it.
Rocket SWITCHES it back. Quill SWITCHES it back.
They're nearing the end of the Asteroid Field when both g switch it at the same time and --
WHAM! A LARGE ASTEROID SMASHES THROUGH the stern of the Milano.

head_text.subj: A CHUNK OF THE REAR OF THE CRAFT DISAPPEARS.

text: Nebula IS SUCKED toward the hole - but, fortunately, her are shackled to a post, so she doesn't fly out.
Her face and body cover with frost.
Everything FLIES AROUND THE SPACECRAFT, RUSHING THROUGH T HOLE.
Groot GOES FLYING, but Quill CATCHES HIM, and casually TO him back to Drax --
So that he can punch in a code, causing -
A PROTECTIVE ENERGY SHIELD SLIDES UP in front of the hole Nebula COLLAPSES to the floor. She yells upstairs --
Idiots!
Everyone catches their breath, relieved.
Well, that's what you get when Quill flies.
Gamora THROWS SOMETHING HARD at the back of Rocket's head
Ow!
There's still a Sovereign craft behind us!
The electronics FLICKER.
Our weapons are down!
Twenty clicks to the jump.
The Mean Pilot BLASTS at them from the sole Sovereign Cra TAKING OUT another part of a wing. The Milano is TREMBLIN
Drax starts climbing down into the living area.
Where's he going?
A group of pilots have gathered around the Mean Pilot, rooting him on, like kids at a video arcade.
Come on, Zylak, you can do this.
Nebula sees the bowl of yaro root has spilled in front of her.
She reaches for a piece, but it's KICKED OUT OF HER WAY.
She looks up to see Drax, grabbing a cable on a spool attached to the wall.
It's not ripe.
Drax HOOKS the cable to his belt. A folder on the wall re SPACESUITS FOR EMERGENCY and, below that, in Rocket's scr OR FOR FUN.
Drax pulls a small disk from the folder. He slaps it betw his shoulder blades and a SHIMMERY SHEATH COVERS HIS ENTI BODY - a thin force-field spacesuit.
Gamora watches THE MAP leading to the jump point.
Fifteen clicks.
Another BLAST from the Sovereign craft HITS them.
The pilots rooting on the Mean Pilot erupt into CHEERS.
Drax grabs a huge rifle.
He punches buttons on the wall. A SECOND PROTECTIVE SHIEL OPENS UP between him and Nebula, and THE FIRST PROTECTIVE SHEATH OPENS, exposing him to space --
The Mean Pilot watches in awe as Drax JUMPS OUT the back the Milano.
Drax smiles. The cable UNSPOOLS and SNAPS TAUT when it reaches its end.
Drax is DRAGGED HAPHAZARDLY by the Milano like a water sl on a boat.
ON THE MAP, the jump point gets closer.
Ten clicks.
The Mean Pilot BLASTS WILDLY at Drax, missing him by mere inches.
Drax brings the sight to his eye.   Aims at the ship.
Die, spaceship.
And he SHOOTS, BLASTING the Sovereign ship.
The Mean Pilot SCREAMS as his lights go out. The Frighten Pilot shakes his head in disgust.
You suck, Zylak.
Zylak is really sad.
As Quill and Rocket leave the asteroid field, it seems fo moment they're scot-free...
Five clicks!
Then DOZENS OF OMNICRAFT pull around them on both sides.
Son-of-a-! They went around the field!
Ayesha smiles.
It looks like the end of the road for the Guardians when

head_text.subj: THERE IS A BLINDING BURST OF LIGHT AND ALL OF THE OMNICRA

text: Ayesha watches in shock as the screens in the pods go dea
Someone destroyed all the ships.
What?! WHO?!
But the Admiral doesn't know.
Rocket sees the BRIGHT WHITE LIGHT is emanating from an O SHAPED SPACECRAFT.
What is that?!
Quill sees the FLICKERING framework of a JUMP POINT.
Doesn't matter! That's the jump point! GO! GO!
As they're about to reach the jump point, Rocket sees a M standing casually atop the oval ship, LIGHT BURSTING THRO HIS BODY and into the craft - the source of the explosion
It's a guy.
Quill doesn't see as the Milano DISAPPEARS INTO THE JUMP POINT.

head_text.subj: I/E. MILANO LIVING AREA/DIRECTLY ABOVE BERHERT

text: The ship POPS IN HERE, TELEPORTING directly above the ear like planet. Because the ship is in such bad shape, parts it TEAR OFF AND SPIRAL AWAY as it enters this new atmosph
Gamora sees Drax being dragged in the REARVIEW MONITOR.
Oh my God.

head_text.subj: I/E. MILANO LIVING AREA/DIRECTLY ABOVE BERHERT

text: Drax WHIPS WILDLY OUT of the back of the ship.   The CABL SPOOL on the wall is coming off -
Quill sees a green forest APPROACHING UNBELIEVABLY FAST.
He turns toward Gamora, but she's gone. Instead Baby Groo is sitting alone, happily munching on candies as if he's watching a movie.
Groot, put on your seat belt!

head_text.subj: I/E. MILANO LIVING AREA/DIRECTLY ABOVE BERHERT

text: The SPOOL DETACHES and FLIES toward the back, which would leave Drax in the upper reaches of the planet's atmospher
But Gamora has made it downstairs - she GRABS ONTO THE SP with one hand while CLUTCHING onto a secure part of the s with her other. As it SNAPS TIGHT, it nearly wrenches her apart. She GROANS.
Prepare for a really bad -
The Milano HITS THE TREES, BARRELING OVER THEM.    They P and FLATTEN and SWAT at the windshield.
Out back, Gamora HOLDS TIGHT despite searing pain, as Dra BOUNCES VIOLENTLY off the trees.
Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow!
And, eventually, the Milano comes to an ABRUPT STOP.
Drax pushes himself up in the dirt. He CHUCKLES.    He gl back at Gamora like the madman he is.
That was awesome.
Gamora nods, sure, yeah, okay, whatever, dude.
CRANE DOWN OVER THE SMOKING, BATTERED MILANO TO our heroe and a still-shackled Nebula.
Either one    of you could have gotten us through    that field, if you had flown with    what's between your ears instead of    what's between your legs!
If what's between my legs had a hand on it, I guarantee I could have landed this ship.
It's not funny, Peter. We almost died. Because of your arrogance.
More like because he stoled Anulax batteries!
They're called Harbulary batteries.
No, they're not!
You know why I did it, Star-Munch?
Quill fumes.
Do you?
I'm not going to answer to `Star- Munch.'
I DID IT BECAUSE I WANTED TO.
Dick.
What are we even talking about this for? We just had a little man save us by blowing up fifty ships!
How little?
Rocket shows him with his finger and thumb.
Like this.
A little one-inch man saved us?
Well, if he got closer I'm sure he'd be much larger.
That's how eyes work, you stupid raccoon.
Don't call me a raccoon!
Oh, I'm sorry, I meant to say `trash panda.'
Rocket pauses, unsure, looks at Drax.
Is that better?
I don't know.
It's worse.
YOU SON-OF-A-!!
Rocket LEAPS, SNAPPING at Quill, when Nebula looks up int the sky.
Someone followed you through the jump point.
A HUGE SPACESHIP HOVERS overhead.
The Guardians COCK THEIR WEAPONS as they FALL BACK-TO-BAC tight formation.
Set me free. You'll need my help.
I'm not a fool, Nebula.
You're a fool if you deprive yourself a hand in combat.
You'll attack me the moment I let you go.
(mumbly, unconvincing) No, I won't.
You'd think an evil supervillain would learn how to properly lie.
I bet it's the one-inch man!!
The SHIP LANDS, CRUSHING ALL OF THE TREES AROUND IT.

A HATCH OPENS, and an adventurous, outer space frontiersm steps forward. He has grown hardened and haggard over the years, but he is definitely the MYSTERIOUS MAN from the beginning of the film. MANTIS, a creepy woman with antenn emerges behind him.
The Man smiles.
After all these years, I've found you.
Who the hell are you?
I figured my rugged good looks would make that obvious. My name's Ego. And I'm your Dad, Peter.
QUIET. A planet of mostly water and white icy patches of land, revolving around two overlapping suns.
SNOW FALLS GENTLY over this sleepy, pastel-colored town o wood and stone buildings.
PUSH IN on the Iron Lotus, a robot brothel and saloon. ASSORTED RAVAGERS, including KRAGLIN, as well as some ROB COURTESANS, are drunk and GIGGLING, trying to catch snowflakes on their tongues.
YONDU UDONTA is staring out the window as he puts on his pants. He looks utterly disconnected and alone.
Behind him are three ROBOT COURTESANS.   One pushes a but on her neck and she POWERS DOWN.
Yondu! Come on down!
Yondu looks down at the street where an older Ravager, TU drunkenly dances, waving for him to join.
Yondu exits his suite. Two bodyguards, BRAHL and HALF-NUT salute and follow him as he descends the stairwell.
At the bottom of the stairs a group of RAVAGERS in BLUE UNIFORMS LAUGH. A gruff, older warrior, STAKAR, and a man seemingly made of diamonds, MARTINEX are among them.
Yondu stops when he sees them. He's struck. Stakar LAUGHS he tells a story -
And I was like, Aleta, I love you, but you're crazy now, you always
Yondu approaches Stakar with trepidation.
Stakar.
Stakar is surprised to see him.
Been some time. I'd -
Seems like this establishment is the wrong kind of disreputable.
The blue-coats turn and walk away.
Stakar...
Stakar glances at the PROPRIETOR as he passes her.
There are a hundred Ravager factions, Sneeper. You just lost the business of ninety-nine by serving one.
Please, sir! Sir!
Yondu stands there for a moment, hurt, as they head out t door.
But, little by little, his hurt turns to rage and he FOLL
Yondu trots quickly toward Stakar and the others.
You all can go to hell! I don't care what you think of me!
Stakar swirls toward him, furious.
Then why you following us for?!
`Cause you'll listen to what I got to say!
I don't got to listen to nothing! You betrayed the code! Ravagers don't deal in kids!
I didn't know what was going on -
You didn't know `cause you didn't want to know, `cause it made you rich!
I demand a seat at the table! I wear the flames same as you!
You may dress like a Ravager but you won't hear no Horns of Freedom when you die, boy, and the Colors of Ogord will not flash over your grave!
You think I take some pleasure in exiling you, you're wrong. You broke all our hearts.
Stakar and the others storm away. Martinex stays a moment staring at Yondu, and then moves on too.
Yondu is left alone, shaken as the WHITE SNOW FALLS GENTL his blue face.
NEARBY, a MONSTROUS RAVAGER leans in toward Kraglin, Tull GEF THE RAVAGER, OBLO, and RETCH. As he eyes Yondu, he

First Quill betrays us and Yondu just lets him go, scot-free. Now he's getting all riled over nothing. We followed him `cause he was the one wasn't afraid to do what needed to be done. Seems like he's going soft.
If he's so soft why you whispering for?
You know I'm right, Kraglin.
You best watch what you say about the Cap'n, Tay -
Who the hell is that?!
Tullk stops when he sees High Priestess Ayesha approachin beside them. The Chambermaids ROLL OUT a LONG BLUE CLOTH she doesn't touch unconsecrated ground.
She STOPS at the carpet's end. Does her best to force a smile.
Yondu Udonta, I have a proposition for you.
Yondu looks at her.
When your mother passed away, I hired Yondu to pick you up.
Quill sits around a campfire with Ego, Mantis and the oth eating. Ego indulges heartily.

I would have done so myself, but I was in the midst of an outlandish adventure at the time, battling demonic forces to save this dimension or some such nonsense - I can't quite recall, it all bleeds together after awhile. But instead of returning you, Yondu kept you. I have no clue as to why.
Because I was a skinny kid who could squeeze into places adults couldn't, making thieving easier.
I've been trying to track you down ever since.
I thought Yondu was your father.
What?
Drax stares at him.
We've been together all this time and you thought Yondu was my actual, blood relative?
You look exactly alike.
One's blue.
He wasn't my father. Yondu was the guy who abducted me. He'd beat the crap out of me so I'd learn how to fight and he kept me in terror threatening to eat me.
Eat you?!
Yes.
That son-of-a-bitch.
How'd you locate us now?
Even where I reside, out past the edge of what's known, we've heard tell of the man they call Star- Lord.
He stands, handing his dish to Gamora.
Say we head out that way now? Your associates are welcome, even that triangle-faced monkey there.
Rocket, self-conscious, feels his nose.
I promise you, it's like no place you've ever seen. And there I can explain your very special heritage, and finally be the father I've always wanted to be.
`Scuse me. I gotta take a whizz.
Ego leaves.   Quill looks at Gamora.
Not buying it.
Peter, we need to take a walk.
Ego is WHISTLING "BRANDY" and PEEING into the bushes.
Mantis looks at Drax. She GRINS, or at least her best att at grinning. It's kind of creepy.
I am Mantis.
What are you doing?
Smiling. I hear it is the thing to do to make people like you.
Not if you do it like that.
Oh. I was raised alone on Ego's planet. I do not understand the intricacies of social interaction.
She points at Rocket.
Can I pet your puppy? It is adorable.
Yes...
She goes to pet Rocket: startled, he SWIRLS and SNAPS at
AHH!
She pulls back her hand. Drax LAUGHS, heartily.
That's called a practical joke!
She GIGGLES.
I liked it very much!
They both LAUGH together. Nebula shakes her head with disbelief.
Quill and Gamora enter this private spot; the campfire flickers through the trees beyond them.
Give me a break! After all this time, and he just expects to be my Dad all of the sudden!
I hear you.
I mean, this could be a trap - the Kree purists, the Ravagers, now the Sovereign - they all want us dead.
I know, but -
But what?
What was that story you told me about Zardu Hasselfrau?
Who?
The wonderful television-singer man. He had a magic boat.
David Hasselhoff?
Right.
He had a talking car, not a magic -
Why did it talk again?
Just to be a good friend, I guess.
And as a child you carried his picture in your pocket, and you told the other children he was your father, but he was out of town --
Shooting Knight Rider or touring with his band in Germany. Why are you bringing this up now? I was drunk when I told you that.
I love that story.
I don't. It's just sad! I was so sad because I'd see the other kids off playing catch with their dads, and I wanted that, more than anything in the world.
Gamora takes Quill's hands in her own.
My point is, maybe this man is your Hasselhoff. I know it's a long shot. But I lost my father as a child. I'd give anything...
Quill nods, grudgingly.
If he ends up being evil, we'll just kill him.
Quill CHUCKLES.
What's funny?
Inside the ship, "THE CHAIN" BY FLEETWOOD MAC PLAYS on th cassette player. Nebula is angry.
You're leaving me with that fox?!
Rocket is SOLDERING the ship.
He's not a fox.
Gamora glances at Rocket as she grabs her outer-space- adventurer version of luggage.
Shoot her if she does anything suspicious. Or if you feel like it.
Rocket GRUNTS.    Gamora looks at a sad Baby Groot.
It will just be a couple days. We'll be back before Rocket's finished fixing the ship.
Gamora steps out. Rocket sees Groot, who is ABOUT TO CRY he watches them go.
Drax and Quill come from the back of the ship.
What about your spool of songs?
I have clones.
What if the Sovereign come?
There's no way for them to know they're here.
I am uncertain about parting ways.
You're like an old woman.
Because I am wise?
Quill turns to Rocket as Drax and Gamora head toward the ship. He starts to say something nice - perhaps something conciliatory but --
Hope daddy isn't as big of a dick as you, orphan boy.
Quill just shakes his head and SNICKERS.
So what's your goal here? To get everyone to hate you? `Cause it's working.
Quill turns back around with Gamora and Drax and walks aw
Rocket looks at the others leaving as THE SONG BECOMES SC I can still hear you saying you will never break the chai Rocket watches them move away.
IN SLOW-MOTION, Quill, Drax, and Gamora approach the oval ship. The slit opens. Ego, with Mantis, is waiting inside
Ego smiles and CLASPS his hand on Quill as he enters.
Quill sits back against the wall, alone, nervous. He look across the way at a SLEEP CHAMBER, where Mantis helps Ego down on a slab.
She places her hand on his forehead with her hand: her antennae ALIGHT. And he drifts off to sleep.
Quill takes a small, folded piece of paper out of his poc
It's the PHOTO OF DAVID HASSELHOFF.
He looks at it, then looks at Ego.    Quill's eyes fill w cautious hope. And the SONG ENDS.
Ego's ship rises, blocking out the sun.
The Orb moves through a rainbowish funnel of space and ti technology beyond what even the Guardians know.
Quill and Drax are drinking tea and LAUGHING with Mantis.
Can I ask you a personal question?
Oh, no one has ever asked me a personal question!
The antennae, what are they for?
Their purpose?
Gamora ENTERS, pouring herself some tea.
Yes, Quill and I have a bet.
You're not supposed to say that.
I say that if you are about to go through a doorway that is too low, your antennae will feel this, and stop you from being decapitated.
Just making clear - if it's anything else - any other answer - I win?
Gamora smiles, warmed by the good-natured, by-now-familia bickering between Quill and Drax.
They are not for feeling doorways.
Damn. I just lost my entire life's savings.
Three pairs of pants.
I think they have something to do with my empathic abilities.
What are - ?
If I touch someone I can feel their
You read minds?
No. Telepaths know thoughts. Empaths feel feelings. Emotions.
She looks at Quill.
May I?
Quill doesn't stop her. Mantis, cautiously, touches him. hand quivers as his emotions shoot through her and her antennae ALIGHT. She is moved.
You feel love.
Yeah, I guess, yeah, I have sort of a general, unselfish love for everyone.
No, romantic, sexual love.
No. No, I don't.
Mantis nods at Gamora.
For her.
No.
Gamora is embarrassed. Drax starts LAUGHING UPROARIOUSLY.
She just told everyone your deepest, darkest secret, Quill! HAHAHAHAHAHA!!!
What the hell, dude? That's a total overreaction.
Drax SLAPS HIS CHEST.
DO ME! DO ME!
Mantis touches Drax. She grins brightly.
I have never felt such humor!
She starts GIGGLING and before long both she and Drax are LAUGHING HYSTERICALLY.
You got to be kidding me.
Drax and Mantis both point at Quill, clutching onto each other and FALLING OVER WITH LAUGHTER. Quill's humiliated.
That's so incredibly uncool.
Mantis wipes the tears from her eyes, composing herself. goes to touch Gamora, who grabs her wrist though her clot
Touch me. And the only thing you're going to feel is a broken jaw.
Mantis smiles, nods, backs away.
I can also alter emotions, to some extent.
Like what?

If I touch someone who is sad I can ease them into contentment, for a short while. I can make a stubborn person compliant. But I mostly use it to help my Master sleep. He lies awake at night, thinking about his progeny.
Quill looks at her, struck by this.
Do one of those on me!
Mantis touches him.    He grins expectantly.
Sleep.
Drax COLLAPSES, INSTANTLY ASLEEP. Mantis smiles at the others, hoping she has pleased. Quill and Gamora look at Drax, SNORING. They're surprised.
Is that real?
It's kind of like someone put a baby's head on a big, muscular body, isn't it?
Four moons shine over the forest. The campfire CRACKLES beside the Milano, and "SOUTHERN NIGHTS" BY GLENN CAMPBEL emerges from the cassette player within.

The Monstrous Ravager and Kraglin lead a group of Ravager over a ravine. Dozens of M-Ships quietly lower behind the Kraglin nods toward the sounds of Glenn Campbell in the distance. They raise their weapons.
OVERHEAD SHOT: dozens and dozens of Ravagers come from different directions, surrounding the Milano.
One Ravager cluster, lead by Half-Nut, CREEPS close enoug the Milano that they see the lights within the vehicle an can hear Rocket inside HUMMING along to the song.
Half-Nut licks his lips in anticipation, closing in for t kill, when he steps on a small pedal. It CLICKS.
A HUNDRED DARTS FLY AT THE GROUP from traps set in trees. They STICK INTO THE RAVAGERS' BODIES, knocking them insta unconscious. As one Ravager FALLS, a GUNSHOT is discharge
Nebula is awakened by the SHOT. She sees a frightened Gro peering through a hole at the bodies falling.
PULL BACK TO REVEAL, beside him, a futuristic walkie-talk with ROCKET'S HUMS emerging.
Rocket is crouched on a limb in shadows above the Milano, smiling and HUMMING to "Southern Nights" into his comm.
He spots A LARGER GROUP OF RAVAGERS APPROACHING THE MILAN from the other side, led by Retch.
Rocket LEAPS TOWARD THEM, from one tree limb to another l a squirrel.
The GROUP enters a clearing close to the ship. A TALL RAV looks up and spots Rocket LEAPING OVER THEIR HEADS.
There!
The Ravagers BLAST at Rocket, following him. He HOPS from tree to tree as BULLETS WHIZZ PAST HIM, leading them righ where he wants them.
He stops in a tree at the end of the run.   He holds a de with two buttons. He presses one of them.
A PERCUSSIVE BOMB at the feet of the Ravagers BURSTS, sen half of them FLYING UP into the air.
As the confused group on the ground watches, Rocket press the second button and a second BOMB BURSTS. They FLY UP I THE AIR as well.
Rocket SNICKERS, as he continues pushes the buttons and t two groups of Ravagers FLY UP and DOWN until the bombs ar depleted of energy.
Retch looks up from the ground, to see the little animal hopping away in the tree limbs overhead.
An EVEN LARGER GROUP OF RAVAGERS walk beneath the branche MOONLIGHT FLICKERING ON THEIR FACES.
TILT UP TO REVEAL ROCKET'S SILHOUETTE on a gnarled limb. clutching an armful of small discs. He breathes shallowly waits. As soon as the last Ravager is passing beneath him he LEAPS onto his back.
Rocket JUMPS FORWARD FROM ONE MAN TO THE NEXT, SLAPPING A STICKY-DISC to each of their heads - SLAP! SLAP! SLAP! SL
And then he LEAPS from the Ravager at the front of the li BACK UP INTO THE TREES.
The men are confused. They bring their fingers to the sti discs on their bodies.
Rocket smiles in the tree as he flicks a trigger. The STI

head_text.subj: DISCS SEND ELECTRICITY COURSING THROUGH ALL OF THE MEN'S

text: They CONVULSE for a moment, then COLLAPSE.
Rocket LEAPS to the ground in a crouch. He sees Brahl approaching in front of him, and then another RAVAGER approaching from behind. They train their weapons on him.
Ain't so tough now without all your toys, are you?
Rocket LEAPS up onto Brahl's face.
He PUNCHES HIM IN THE THORAX so hard he can't breathe.
The other Ravager SHOOTS at him, but Rocket BACKFLIPS ove the SHOT so Brahl is STRUCK instead.
Rocket LANDS on the back of the shooter's neck and RAPID- PUNCHES HIM in the head, until the man CRUMPLES to the ground, unconscious.
As Rocket lands, he HEARS WHISTLING and he looks up to se

head_text.subj: YONDU'S ARROW FLYING THROUGH THE TREES, DIRECTLY TOWARD H

text: Crap.
Another high-pitched WHISTLE and the arrow STOPS ABRUPTLY FLOATING with the tip almost grazing Rocket's forehead.
Yondu waltzes out of the trees with Tullk, Kraglin, the Monstrous Ravager, and many more.
Rocket reluctantly raises his hands in surrender.
Hey there, rat.
How's it going, you blue idiot?
Eh, not so bad. We got a pretty good gig. A golden gal with quite a high opinion of herself offered us a large sum to deliver you and your pals to her, so she can kill y'all.
Nebula looks out the window to see even more Ravagers surrounding Rocket. She looks at baby Groot.
Your friend. There's too many of them. They're going to kill him.
Groot looks as if he's about to cry.
He needs my help. If you care about him, you need to get me out of these bonds.
Groot is unsure.
The Ravagers have entirely encircled Rocket. There's no chance of escape. Though upset, he mostly holds it in.
Pretty easy to find you, since we put a tracer on your ship back during the War over Xandar.
You give me your word you won't hurt Groot, and I'll tell you where the batteries are.
Lucky for you my word don't mean squat. Otherwise I'd actually hand you over.
Otherwise you'd what?!
Yondu scowls at the Monstrous Ravager.
We'll take the batteries. They're worth a a quarter mil on the open
That priestess offered us a million! A quarter is only one third of that!
A quarter ain't one-th -
A quarter is four times a million! We're in the money!
No, idiot. A quarter is twenty- five.
We can't even buy a pair of boots with twenty-five units!
The point is, we aren't stupid enough to help kill the Guardians of the Galaxy. We'd have the whole Nova Corps on us.
That ain't right. I just gotta say it this one time, Cap'n.
Everyone looks at Kraglin.
No matter how many times Quill betrays you, you protect him, like none of the rest of us much matter. I'm the one what sticks up for you, me and Tullk.
Damn straight, lad. You're right: he's going soft. S'pose it's time for a change in leadership!
The Monstrous Ravager points his weapon at Yondu.
Others follow his lead.
A handful of others, including Tullk and the Innocent Ravager, raise their weapons in their Captain's defense, that the whole circle are aiming at one another. Kraglin confused.
Put you damn guns down!
Rocket is in the center of the potential crossfire.
Hold on! There's got to be some sort of peaceful resolution here! Or even a violent resolution, where I'm standing over there.
Yondu glares at the Monstrous Ravager.   His FIN LIGHTS U he starts to WHISTLE when -
HEAD. The arrow CLATTERS to the ground.
Rocket watches as Yondu, confused, TOTTERS there for a moment, and then COLLAPSES --
REVEALING NEBULA behind him, clutching a smoking pistol. Rocket looks at her, dead-eyed: really?
She SHOOTS HIM WITH A BLAST OF ELECTRICITY, knocking him unconscious.
The Ravagers gape at Nebula.
Well, hello, boys.
She takes a bite from a piece of yaro root she stole from Milano. As she chews, she becomes disgusted.
She spits it out.
It's not ripe.
Ego's ship ARRIVES at a bold red planet, twisting in fron an enormous yellow sun, so close it seems like the sun is about to devour it. "MY SWEET LORD" BY GEORGE HARRISON PL
Mantis sets her hand on Ego's forehead, waking him.
Ego's ship lands in a spaceport. It organically JOINS the spot where it lands - strands of material actually linkin with the landing pad itself.
From the front of the craft, a FLOATING TRAM emerges, wit Ego, Mantis, Quill, Gamora, and Drax.

As the TRAM GLIDES toward its destination, the Guardians overwhelmed by transcendentally splendid surroundings. Th plant life is colorful and alien. Tall, twisting obelisks seem to have no function other than beauty itself.
Welcome, friends, to my world.
Wow. You have your own planet?
But a trifle, no larger than your earth's moon.
Humility. I like it. I too, am extraordinarily humble.
Even Gamora smiles at the wonder of it all.
Multicolored mercurial clumps FLOAT BY.
Drax pokes one, and it BURSTS INTO A DOZEN VIBRANT HUES.
Ahead of them looms an astounding palace atop a mountain.
It's beautiful.
The tram STOPS.
They step off it and toward the palace, Ego stops beside large FOUNTAIN.
Peter, consider this a token of a father's pride.
Ego motions; the WATERS OF THE FOUNTAIN FALL AWAY, REVEAL a GIANT STATUE OF STAR-LORD: Quill stands heroically, wit foolish-looking Guardians kneeling around him worshipfull
A memorial to the War Over Xandar, when you single-handedly saved the galaxy.
Single-handedly?
Whoa. It's perfect.
You've got to be kidding.
Why am I dead? Why did you all kill me?!
That's Ronan. That's you.
Drax is sitting on Quill's shoulder, with a raccoon tail.
When was I that tiny?
Gamora shakes her head in disbelief. They step past the statue and onto the steps approaching the palace.
You own a planet and can destroy two dozen spaceships without a suit. What are you, exactly?
I'm what they call a Celestial, sweetheart.
The Guardians STOP behind him, astounded.
A Celestial. Like a... god?
Small `g', son. At least on the days I'm feeling humble as Drax.
He LAUGHS and walks up the stairs.
Ego SAUNTERS with Quill, Gamora, Drax, and Mantis, throug the enormous open doors, toward huge DIORAMAS lining eith side of the palace, like cosmic Stations of the Cross.
This form you see before you is only an extension of who I truly am. I don't know where I came from, exactly.
The DIORAMAS around them begin to ANIMATE: In the first, FLICKERING BRAIN COMPOSED OF POLYCHROMATIC LIGHT FLOATS i space.
The first thing I remember is flickering, adrift in the cosmos - utterly and entirely alone.
The flickering brain pulls cosmic dust and rocks into its ingesting them, GROWING.
I fed on the matter around me like plankton. I grew smarter and stronger.
A hard metal shell forms around the brain, with channels running through for his energy to flow like rivers.
I formed a sheathe to protect myself from the elements.
Ego continues developing outward from the shell, growing planet, then its beautiful landscapes and structures.
And continued building from there, layer by layer, the very planet you walk on now. I built the spires reaching up to the sky and the tunnels burrowing into its depths.
Wow.
But I was no ant to be fulfilled solely by labor. I wanted more. I desired... meaning.
In the core shell - the Self Chamber - the flickering bra floats, alone, perhaps sad.
There must be some life out there in the universe besides just me, I thought, and I set myself to task with finding it.
The brain grows a SKELETAL FRAMEWORK OF LIGHT up from the self chamber and to the surface of the planet. He pulls molecules around this shape to create his "human" self.
I created what I imagined biological life might be like, down to the most minute detail.
Did you make a penis?
Dude.
If he's a planet, how did he make a baby with your mother? He would smush her.
I don't need to hear about how my parents, you know -
Why? My father would tell me the story of impregnating my mother every winter solstice.
That's disgusting.
It was beautiful. You earthers have hang-ups.
Yes, Drax, I've got a penis.
Oh my God.
It's not half bad. I've also got pain receptors, a digestive system, and all the accompanying junk. I wanted to experience what it truly meant to be human as I set out amongst the stars.
In another DIORAMA, Ego explores various uninhabited and barren planets.
I visited thousands of planets over thousands of years, one barren husk after the next until I found what I sought...
Ego stares down at a CUTE ALIEN CHILD.
Life. I was not alone in this universe after all.
Ego reminisces: wistful? Sad? It's hard to tell.
When did you meet my mother?
Not long after.
Ego turns toward the last set of DIORAMAS. They show Mere and Ego kissing and Ego with his hand on Meredith's pregn belly.
It was with Meredith that I experienced love for the first time. I called her my river lily. And from that love, Peter, you.
In the final DIORAMA we PUSH IN on the belly and see, ins the womb, VERY young Peter Quill, a fetus, himself encase light.
Quill looks up in amazement - this story is the story of himself. And Ego gazes at Quill with adoration.
I searched for you for so long. When I heard a man from earth held an Infinity Stone in his hand without dying, I knew you must be the son of the woman I loved.
Ego puts his hand on Quill. Quill wants to believe, but h can't quite let it go.
If you loved her why did you leave her?
The Ravagers' massive ship FLOATS in space.
You can't do this!
Ravagers LAUGH as they DRAG Tullk across the floor while STRUGGLES to get free.
This is mutiny! Mutiny!
They shove Tullk into a cylindrical room as a glass door CLOSES on him.
He continues SCREAMING and SLAMMING ON THE GLASS, but we barely hear him.
Half-Nut smiles and presses a button. The outside of the compartment OPENS so that Tullk is SUCKED INTO SPACE.
Tullk FLOATS AWAY, opening his mouth to scream, but he ca His FACE AND BODY SWELL QUICKLY and he EXPIRES there.
As we CURL AROUND his lifeless body, we REVEAL the countl other CORPSES of Ravagers loyal to Yondu, leading like br crumbs toward nothing at all.

Yondu watches this, helplessly. He's in a chair, his hand tied behind him. He's a wreck, his headpiece destroyed, w hanging from a gap in his head where the fin used to be. sees the mutineers grab the innocent Oblo, DRAGGING HIM t the same fate as Tullk.
Cap'n, help me! Cap'n?!
Yondu drops his head in shame.
You're the one what kilt those men by leading `em down the wrong path.
He PUNCHES Yondu.
Because you're weak.
He PUNCHES him again.
And stupid.
The Monstrous Ravager turns towards the Ravagers, who lis rapt and vengeful. Nebula leans calmly against a wall, watching. Kraglin watches too, seemingly concerned.
It's time for the Ravagers to once again rise to glory with a new Cap'n... TASERFACE.
The Ravagers SHOUT IN APPROVAL. Taserface throws his arms in glory - when he hears SNICKERING. He stops.
He and the other Ravagers turn and see Rocket, also in a chair with his arms secured behind him, GIGGLING.
I'm sorry. Your name is... it's `Taserface'?
That's right.
Do you... shoot tasers out of your face?
It's metaphorical!
For what?
Taserface thinks. Time for a new answer:
It's a name what strikes fear in anyone what hears it!
Really?... Okay, sure.
Taserface screams at him, SPIT FLYING EVERYWHERE.
You shut up! You're next!
Taserface goes back to Yondu, bringing out his blade.
Udonta, I been waiting to do this for a long ti -
Again they hear SNICKERING. Rocket is burying his mouth i his chest, TRYING TO STOP FROM CRACKING UP.
What?! What?!
I'm sorry, I'm so sorry. I just keep imagining you waking up one morning, looking in the mirror, and, in all seriousness, saying `You know what would be a really kickass name? Taserface!'
Nebula smirks. The Ravagers are TRYING NOT TO LAUGH. Rock can't stop LAUGHING.
What was your second choice?! Scrotum Hat?!
The Ravagers all BUST OUT LAUGHING.
New plan. We're killing you first.
Taserface SHOVES HIM BACK, ready to plunge the knife in h Rocket's smile disappears. He stares at Taserface with de eyes.
Well, dying is certainly better than having to live an entire life as a moronic shitbag who thinks `Taserface' is a cool name.
Taserface goes to stab him, when -
That's enough killing for today.
Taserface turns toward her, irritated.
Thought you were the biggest sadist in the galaxy.
That was when Daddy was paying my bills. The Priestess wants to kill the fox herself. And he -
- has bounties on his head in at least twelve Kree provinces.
Taserface glares at her. It's obvious he's considering attacking her.
I assure you, I am not as easy a mark as an old man without his magic stick or a talking woodland beast.
Taserface decides not to risk it.
I want ten percent of the take, and a couple more things.
Nebula is TRYING OUT A BRAND NEW HAND as Kraglin leads he through this hall.
We got a whole box of hands if that one don't work out.
It's fine.
You think them Kree is gonna execute the Cap'n?
The Kree consider themselves merciful. It will be painless.
Kraglin comes to an open doorway beside a huge DOCKING BA and an M-SHIP decked out with lots of weapons.
Well, there it is, best ship we got. The location of Ego's planet's in the nav. We'll wire you the ten percent when we's paid. What you gonna do with your share?
Nebula stops at the doorway.

As a child my father would have Gamora and me battle one another in `training.' Every time my sister prevailed my father would replace a piece of me with machinery, claiming he wanted me to be her equal. But she won, again and again and again. Never once refraining. Because of them, I am this. So after I murder my sister, I will buy a warship with every conceivable instrument of death.
I will hunt my father like a dog and I will tear him apart slowly, piece by piece, until he knows some semblance of the profound and unceasing pain I know every single day.
Kraglin stares at her, weirded-out.
Yeah... I was talking about, like, a pretty necklace. Or a nice hat. Something that'll make the other girls go `oooooo, that's nice.'
Nebula gives him a look of pure death.
Anyway, uh, happy trails.
Quill looks up at a GIANT SCULPTURE of his mother. He is upset. Ego is behind him, watching him, sadly.
My mother told everyone my father was from the stars.
Quill turns to look at his father, somewhat accusatory.
She had brain cancer - so everyone thought she was delusional.
Ego looks sad, ashamed.
Listen. I'd love to believe all of this, I really would - but you left the most wonderful woman ever, to die alone!
Ego has tears in his eyes.
I didn't want to leave your mother, Peter. But if I don't return regularly to this planet, and the light within, this form will wither and perish --
So why didn't you come back?! Why'd you send Yondu, a criminal, of all people, to fetch me?!
I loved your mother, Peter! I couldn't stand to set foot on an earth where she wasn't living! You can't imagine what that's like!
I know exactly what that's like! I had to watch her die!
Ego stops, seeming to hear his son.   He touches him.
Over the millions and millions of years of my existence I have made many mistakes, Peter. But you're not one of them. Please give me the chance to be the father she would want me to be.
Quill looks at him, vulnerable.
There are so many things I need to teach you. This planet, and the light within... they are a part of you.
What do you mean?
Ego takes Quill's hands in his own, gently, putting them the correct position.
Give me your hands, son.    Here. Hold them like that.
Quill holds his hands apart.   Ego steps back, holding hi hands in the same way.
Now close your eyes and concentrate. Take your brain to the center of the planet.
Quill concentrates. He holds his hand out.    A white lig emanates from it.
Yes! Yes!
Whoa.
The light disappears as quickly as it came.
Yes, yes - it's okay. Just relax. Concentrate. You can do it. Bring it back.
Quill concentrates and the LIGHT, once again, bursts up f the palms of his hands.
Yes, yes, now - shape it -
Ego shows him, pulling in the molecules around him, so th the light itself forms into the shape of a ball.
Feel the energy.
Quill tries to pull molecules into the ball. And, little little, they come, and the ball glows brighter.
Yes.
Quill laughs. Ego is JOYOUS. He almost looks as if he's g to break down in tears.
You're home, Peter.
Ego cups his hands.
Here.
Quill, smiling, THROWS him the ball. Ego LAUGHS. He inspe the cosmic ball of light, and he throws it back to Quill.
Quill LAUGHS, catching it, and throws it back.   Ego move back further.
And Ego and Quill continue tossing the ball back and fort there, LAUGHING, a friendly father and son game of catch the middle of a palace courtyard.
Drax and Mantis sit here, soaking in the sun and gazing a the lush, flowing hills, like something an alien Maxfield Parrish would paint.
How did you get here?
Ego found me in my larva state, orphaned on my homeworld. He raised me by hand, and kept me as his own.
So you're a pet?
I suppose.
People usually want cute pets. Why would Ego want a hideous one?
I am hideous?
You're horrifying to look at, yes.
Mantis seems sad about this.    Drax notice this, feels b
But it is a good thing.
Oh?
When you are ugly and someone loves you, you know they love you for who you are. Beautiful people never know who to trust.
Well, then I am certainly grateful to be ugly!
Poor Gamora. She can never trust anyone.
Drax nods and stares out at spattered patches of water.
Those pools remind me of a time I took my daughter to visit the Forgotten Lakes on my homeworld. She was like you.
Disgusting?
Innocent.
Drax stares out at them without expression.
Slowly, Mantis TOUCHES his shoulder.
And, as she does, TEARS INSTANTLY FLOW DOWN HER CHEEKS. S stares with Drax at the hills. They feel the sadness together: she cries while he's stoic.

I have never met anyone like you, or your friends. You are filled with such... love. It is a thing I did not know existed, not like this, and I think... I think it may be the very finest of all things. It both hurts and soothes the heart.
She looks at Drax. There is something she wants to say, b she is torn.
Drax, there is something I must
What's going on?
Drax and Mantis turn to see her behind them. She smiles.
I am learning many things. Like I am a pet and ugly.
You're not ugly.
Drax.
Drax, confused, points at Mantis, as if her ugliness prov itself.
Mantis, can you show us where we'll be staying? I'm getting eye-strain in this place.
Mantis nods, yes.
Gamora, Drax, and Mantis walk across the sunset.
Why are there no other beings on this planet?
The planet IS Ego. A dog would not invite a flea to live on his back.
And you're not a flea?
I'm a flea with a purpose. I help him sleep.
Gamora curls around Mantis, cutting her off.
What were you about to say to Drax before I walked out?
Mantis looks around, worried.
Nothing.
Gamora and Drax share a look: why is she so scared? Manti moves on.
Your quarters are this way.
Rocket HITS THE GROUND, hard.   Yondu LANDS equally hard the ground beside him.
They look up to see Taserface, Gef the Ravager and an OBT RAVAGER locking the cell door.
We'll deliver you to the Kree in the morning. Neither one of you gonna last much longer after that.
Rocket crawls toward them as they walk away.
Okay, Taserface. See you later, Taserface. Hey, Taserface, tell the other guys we said hi, Taserface!
Taserface glances back, perturbed, as he disappears aroun the corner.
Taserface, Gef, and Obtuse come around the hall.
What about the little plant? Can I smash it with a rock?
No, Gef! It's too adorable to kill. Bring it to the tailor.
Yondu and Rocket settle.   Yondu looks like a beaten man.
No offense, but your employees are a bunch of jerks.

I was a Kree battle-slave for twenty years when Stakar freed me. He offered me a place in the Ravagers. Said all I needed to do was adhere to the code. But I was young and greedy and stupid - like you stealing those batteries.
That was mostly Drax.
Me and Stakar, and the other captains - we weren't so different from you and your friends. The only family I ever had. But I broke the code. They exiled me.
These ones here are the ones who followed - of course they're jerks. Which is what I deserve.
Slow down, drama queen. You might deserve this, but I don't. We gotta get out of here.
Where's Quill?
Went off with his old man.
Ego?
Yondu looks concerned. Rocket stares at him, picking this
Yeah. It's a day for dumbass names.
Yondu SNICKERS.
You smiled and for a second I got a warm feeling, but then it was ruined by those disgusting-ass teeth. Ever heard of floss?
Yondu's smile disappears.
You're like a professional asshole or - ?
Pretty much a pro. Why didn't you deliver Quill to Ego like you promised?
He was skinny, could fit into places we couldn't. Good for thieving.
Rocket nods, GRUMBLES.
I got an idea on how to get outta here. But we're gonna need your little friend.
Baby Groot is wearing a tiny Ravager uniform. He reacts t clothes like a cat, struggling to take them off but unabl Ravagers are gathered around him, drunk and LAUGHING. The are CHANTING "MASCOT."
Lil' feller's all worked up! Needs a drank!
Retch POURS ALCOHOL on him. The Ravagers LAUGH MORE as ot POUR DRINKS on him as well. Groot SCREAMS at them, furiou but helpless.
Lookit how cute it is when it's all riled up!
It's Goddang precious!
Groot, in shadows, MOPES down the hallway, looking traumatized. His clothes are torn and he's soaked in alco
As he passes the cell, he hears -
Hey, twig. C'mere.
Groot sees Yondu and Rocket looking at him in the cell. H steps toward them.
Oh, man. What'd they do to you?
Hey, you wanna help us get outta here?
Groot NODS.   Rocket looks unsure. Yondu speaks slowly.
There's something I need you to get, and bring back to me.
Groot NODS.
In the Cap'n's quarters, there's a prototype fin, like the thing I wore on my head.
Groot NODS.
There's a drawer next to the bunk. It's inside that. It's red. You got it?
Groot NODS EMPHATICALLY and DARTS OFF to get it.   Yondu at Rocket, pleased.
Rocket looks more than a bit uncertain.
Baby Groot CREEPS into this dark room.    DRUNKEN RAVAGER sprawled everywhere.
He spots a bureau.    A drawer is half open.
His face lights up.
Baby Groot stands outside of the cell, beaming, holding A PAIR OF SHORTS.
That's my underwears.
Yeah, I was pretty sure he didn't know what you were talking about. You have to explain it more careful.
All right. It's a prototype fin -
Groot is back in front of the cell, holding a wriggling ORLONI in his hands.
That's an orloni. It's a fin, Groot.
You explain it this time.
Rocket starts to speak -
Groot looks hopeful, holding out a CYBERNETIC EYE.
That's Vorker's eye. He takes it out when he sleeps. Go look again.
Groot starts to SLINK OFF -
But leave the eye here.
Why?
Rocket CAN HARDLY SPEAK he finds it so funny.
He's gonna wake up tomorrow and he's not gonna know where his eye is!
Groot is DRAGGING a LARGE PIECE OF FURNITURE to the cell.
That's a desk. We told you it was this big.
Rocket shows him how small it is with his hands.
Groot makes a face like "Oh!" as if NOW he gets it. It's coming together.
Groot is holding a SEVERED TOE.
Tell me you guys have a refrigerator somewhere with a bunch of severed human toes.
Yondu SUBTLY SHAKES HIS HEAD.
Okay, then let's just agree to never discuss this.
Yondu RIPS the Ravager patch off his jacket.
The drawer you want to open. Has this symbol on it, okay?
Groot takes it. He looks at Yondu and NODS.
And then, slowly, HE PLACES IT ON TOP OF HIS HEAD.
What? No.
He thinks you want him to wear it as a hat.
That's not what I said.
Groot takes it off his head.
I am Groot.
He's relieved that you don't want him to.
I am Groot.
He hates hats.
I am Groot.
On anyone, not just himself.
I am Groot.
One minute you think someone has a weird-shaped head. The next minute, it's just because you realize part of that head is a hat.
That's why you don't like hats?
Groot nods.
This is an important conversation right now?
No.   Let's try again.
Taserface is SNORING and SLOBBERING in his bed. We see th Ravager Patch tossed up onto the bed beside him. Then Groot's vines GROW up the bed, and he pulls himself up be the sleeping giant.
Groot clasps the Ravager patch in his hand and looks fearfully around.
He spots the Ravager symbol on a night stand drawer.
He stares at the symbol in his hand, then at the drawer, at the symbol, and then at the drawer again, and then one more time for good measure -- he wants to be very, very s they're the same.
He creeps carefully towards the drawer, GROWING his vines to grab the handle and PULL IT slowly open...
He peers inside.
Beside some writing instruments and a tin of candies, the lies a RED FIN, taller and more shark-like than Yondu's current model. Groot smiles hugely, picking up -
THE TIN OF CANDIES! He's found it!
That ain't it.
Groot SWIRLS to see KRAGLIN, BACKLIT IN THE DOORWAY, LOOM OVER HIM, intimidating as hell. And CUT TO --
The RED FIN PLOPS DOWN at Yondu's feet.
Yondu and Rocket look up to see Kraglin, holding Groot. H stares at the ground -
I didn't mean to do a mutiny. (pause, then, sadly) They killed all my friends.
Go get the third quadrant ready for release.
Kraglin SALUTES.
One more thing.
Kraglin stares at him.
You got any clones of Quill's old music on the ship?
Brahl is shaving, when, suddenly, JAY AND THE AMERICAN'S "COME A LITTLE BIT CLOSER" STARTS PLAYING over the interc
He looks up, confused.
TWO RAVAGERS outside the cell hear the MUSIC.     They tu unlocking the cell door.
As they enter, THE CAMERA OVERTAKES them, arriving before they do at --
Yondu, sitting calmly; Rocket is finishing ATTACHING THE ASS FIN TO HIS HEAD. Its electrical systems POP on.
PUSH IN ON the two surprised Ravagers trying to UNHOLSTER THEIR PISTOLS in time.
Too late.
Yondu WHISTLES.
The ARROW FLIES OFF a shelf of supplies and SHOOTS TOWARD WALL.
The ARROW PUNCHES THROUGH THE WALL behind the Ravagers. T swirl to see it --
And THEN THE OTHER --
And then to Yondu; he CATCHES it, and STANDS.
He SAUNTERS past the two Ravagers as they WOBBLE and FALL Rocket and Groot follow.
On the way out the door, Rocket looks down and sees TWO PISTOLS beside the dead Ravagers.
He smiles.
Taserface is awoken by JAY AND THE AMERICANS on the PA. glances over to see the open drawer beside him, sans gargantuan fin.
He SCRAMBLES for the comm, yelling into it --
He's got it!
The hoard of Ravagers hear Taserface's voice.
HE'S GOT IT! YONDU'S GOT THE DAMN FIN!
GO!
ALL OF THE RAVAGERS all over the ship, in a panic, LOAD T WEAPONS and HEAD TOWARD THE CELL.
Yondu and Rocket and Groot COME AROUND THIS CORNER IN SLO MOTION, the three biggest badasses in the history of cine
A HOARD OF RAVAGERS, led by Brahl, FILE IN at the end of hallway.
But Yondu WHISTLES and the ARROW TWISTS QUICKLY BACK AND FORTH, SLICING THROUGH EACH OF THEM.
Yondu SLAMS through a door into -
Our heroes step onto a catwalk in this, the biggest space the Eclector. There are catwalks throughout and dozens of docked M-ships. The SCURRILOUS RAVAGER sees them from abo
Down there!
IN AN EXTREME WIDE ANGLE, we see the ARROW FLYING UP AND
RAVAGERS, closer and further from CAMERA.
We TRAVEL BEHIND YONDU AND ROCKET as BODIES FALL AROUND T IN SLOW-MOTION LIKE FIREWORKS.
Groot looks up and sees RETCH looking down at him.
RETCH FLEES in terror as Groot GROWS branches to pull him up behind him.
Groot HOWLS FURIOUSLY, TAKING CHASE.
Retch YOWLS like a child as he frantically runs.
But Groot GROWS HIS BRANCHES around RETCH's legs, TRIPPIN HIM.
BAM! He FALLS, face first to the floor.
And, with a WAR CRY, Baby Groot FLINGS the sadistic Ravag off the edge towards the abyss below.
As RETCH FALLS past Yondu and Rocket, Baby Groot DROPS ba down onto Rocket's shoulder, and they push their way thro the doorway -
Yondu, Rocket, and Groot move into this area, where they up at DOZENS OF SECURITY MONITORS encircling them showing Ravagers filing toward them from every part of the ship.
Yondu WHISTLES as he watches the MONITORS -
ON A MONITOR, the arrow FLIES out the wall. He whistles s that it strikes TWO RAVAGERS running towards them.
It ZIPS out of that room and
A HOARD of Ravagers come running down a hall. The ARROW Z overhead, smashing out all the lights so that the hall is completely dark, except for the DIM RED LIGHT OF THE ARRO
And we can just make out the RED LIGHT smashing through t body of every Ravager there and then on into --
A YELLING CROWD OF RAVAGERS come, hungry for war, when th arrow SHOOTS THROUGH THE CHAINS holding a giant spaceship place over their heads.
It FALLS, instantly CRUSHING them all, and then zips on -
Gef the Ravager is drunkenly drinking a mug of beer, when arrow zips past him and through the mug, SHATTERING it.
As Gef looks at the shattered mug, confused, the arrow co flying back, ripping through Gef himself, FLINGING him of the bar stool.
Rocket also uses the MONITORS to pinpoint where their attackers are. He methodically SHOOTS THROUGH the walls, striking the Ravagers as they get closer.
WIDE OVERHEAD SHOT, the CAMERA REVOLVES as hoards of Rava GET CLOSE to Yondu and Rocket but the arrow and gunshots THROUGH THE WALLS taking them all down, one by one, like Busby Berkely gone mad.
Then Yondu stops, seeing something on one of the MONITORS
Taserface, clutching a big ass gun, is marching down the towards them.
Yondu WHISTLES, loudly and angrily.
Taserface sees THE ARROW COMING AROUND A CORNER TOWARDS H
Yondu WHISTLES again.
The ARROW BURSTS INTO FLAMES.
Taserface DODGES it.
He turns to watch it go, CACKLING pridefully over his agility.
But his smile quickly dissipates.
The arrow PLUNGES into a giant tank - which EXPLODES, ENGULFING HIM.
A huge portion of the giant spacecraft EXPLODES, leading domino effect of one part of the ship BURSTING after anot
ROCKET is dumbfounded as he sees on the MONITORS the nume EXPLOSIONS throughout the ship.
You maniac. The whole ship is gonna blow.
A DOOR SWINGS OPEN and TASERFACE FALLS ONTO THE FLOOR, ENGULFED IN FLAMES, but furious.
He angrily SLAPS off the flames as he reaches for a COMMUNICATIONS MODULE.
Not the whole ship.
Yondu catches the arrow and walks out.
Kraglin ENTERS, pulling latches and flipping switches and twisting dials on elementary flight controls.
With pained effort, Taserface PULLS UP A VIDEO SCREEN wit SOVEREIGN CHAMBERMAID.
Who is this? You're not supposed to be on this line.
I'm sending you the coordinates for Yondu's ship.
Yondu enters with Rocket and Groot.
Release the quadrant.
I only ask one thing. That your High Priestess tells him the name of the man what sealed his fate: Taserface.
The CHAMBERMAID laughs uncontrollably at his name.
Taserface looks really sad as he EXPLODES.
As Rocket and Groot, frightened, feel the SHIP EXPLODING around them, Kraglin pulls up one final latch -

head_text.subj: THE ENTIRE REAR UPPER QUADRANT OF THE ECLECTOR DETACHES F

text: THE REST OF THE SHIP, while the remains CONTINUE EXPLODIN
Rocket and Groot are amazed as the SHIP thrusts forward, from the explosions.
Kraglin keys into a JUMP POINT ahead. Nearby, Rocket pull the Navigation panel.
Where to, Cap'n?
Rocket SETS THE DESTINATION:
Ego.
NO, BOY!
The Quadrant TREMBLES as they hit THE JUMP POINT.    It B out of present space, making the JUMP to -
The Quadrant POPS into a blue sky above a DESERT with two fighting KRONANS.
Inside the ship, Rocket, Yondu, Kraglin, and baby Groot h on for dear life as the ship VIOLENTLY SHAKES and THE LOCATIONS OUTSIDE OF THE WINDOW RAPIDLY SHIFT.
Their bodies DISTEND SLIGHTLY. Yondu is furious.
It ain't healthy for a mammalian body to hop over fifty jumps at a time.
I know that.
We're about to do seven-hundred.
Rocket looks bummed.
The Quadrant pops out of a jump point into this Pepto Bis pink land, SMASHING THROUGH an AMOEBA-LIKE BLOB, and then through the next jump point.
Kraglin, Yondu, Rocket, and Baby Groot all SCREAM, their entire faces and bodies distorting as if in some evil funhouse mirror.
The yellow sun CURVES SLOWLY WEST TO EAST over this magnificent landscape.

head_text.subj: "BRING IT ON HOME TO ME" BY SAM COOKE PLAYS.

text: TILT DOWN to Quill, on this veranda, gazing out at the beauty. The Walkman is connected to small, jerry-rigged speakers nearby, PLAYING SAM COOKE.
So I guess this could all be mine someday.
Gamora isn't paying attention. She's fooling with a communications device, which has no reception.
Rocket? Rocket, you there?   Dammit.
Quill comes up behind her, messing with her.
What are you doing, Peter?
Dance with me.
No. I'm not --
Come on. This is Sam Cooke, one of the greatest Earth singers of all time.
Gamora lets out an exasperated SIGH, but, reluctantly, st DANCING with him. She is incredibly light on her feet.
Quill smiles and Gamora, despite herself, does as well. H TWIRLS HER AND BRINGS HER BACK IN. This is definitely not first time they've done this.
Drax thinks you're not a dancer.
If you ever tell anyone about this, I'll kill you.
They look at each other.
When are we going to do something about this... unspoken thing between us?
What unspoken thing?
sort of thing?
There is no unspoken thing between us.
Well, that's a Catch-22. Because if you said there was, it would be spoken, and then you'd be a liar. So by saying there isn't, you're telling the truth, and admitting there is.
That's not --
Gamora PULLS AWAY.
What we should be discussing right now is that something about this place doesn't feel right.
What are you talking about? You were the one who wanted me to come here!
Gamora moves into --
That girl, Mantis. She's afraid of something.
Quill follows her.   He stops, staring at her, hurt and frustrated.
Why are you trying to take this from me?
I'm not --
He's my father. He's blood -
You have blood on earth. You never wanted to return there.
Again - you made me come here! And Earth?! Earth is the place my mother died in front of me.
No, it's because that's real, and this is a fantasy.
This is real. I'm only half human, remember?
That's the half I'm worried about.
Oh, I get it. You're jealous because I'm part god! You like me being the weak one!
Gamora adds some pieces to her transmitter.
Uh. You were insufferable to begin with. I haven't been able to reach Rocket. I'm going to see if I can get a signal outside.

You know, this isn't Cheers after all. It's whatever the show is where one person is willing to, you know, open themselves up to new possibilities, and the other person is just kind of a jerk who doesn't trust anyone! It's a show that doesn't exist - it would never be made, it would be so horrible! It would get zero ratings!
You're having a conversation with yourself! I don't know what Cheers is!
I finally found my family, don't you understand that!?
I thought you already had.
So this is how it ends, then? Our whole story. Like this? You and me?
Get it through your head, Peter. There is no you and me. There never was.
Quill watches her leave.
Gamora sits, alone in the fields, pouting, fuming.   She stops, staring angrily inward.
Two plants, nearby, flitter against one another in the wi making a CLICKING sound. She side-eyes them. They don't s
She slices them off with her sword.
Dammit.
Gamora hears something. She turns to see, in the distance M-ship flying toward the planet.
She watches as it gets closer and closer, and realizes it FLYING DIRECTLY AT HER.
Gamora RUNS.
Nebula HOLLERS as she BLASTS HER GUNS, DIVING towards Gam
Gamora FLEES from Nebula's ship like Cary Grant from the duster in North by Northwest as HUGE CHUNKS OF LAND EXPLO on either side of her.
Gamora leaps into a DITCH, LANDING HARD, as the M-Ship SW just a couple feet above her.
You psychopath.
Gamora sees the M-Ship banking and FLYING BACK at her aga
She stands and runs along the hillside as GUN BLASTS burs behind her. But Gamora sees a CAVERN, leading down into t earth.
She DARTS into it.
As Gamora RUNS down the cavern, she glances back over her shoulder where Nebula, insane with rage, continues FLYING towards her --
The M-SHIP ENTERS THE CAVERN, which is too small for it, CLIPPING ITS WINGS - but it keeps flying. It again BLASTS Gamora as she FLEES -
The BLASTS cause the ground to COLLAPSE around Gamora, an she FALLS, SMASHING DOWN THROUGH ONE LEVEL, to another le below, SLAMMING HARD on the ground.
The underside of the M-ship gets SCRAPED APART as it flie above her, and pieces of it come RAINING DOWN around her.
Nebula ZOOMS towards a huge cavern wall.   She tries to t her ship in time, to no avail.
She SIDESWIPES it, falling down, CRASHING on the ground, where she is now on the same level as Gamora.
Gamora sees something beside her: it's one of the ENORMOU BLASTERS from the M-ship, attached to an AMMO RIG.
Nebula sees Gamora, through the canopy, picking up the blaster, and clutching it. It is comically enormous.
Nebula struggles to get free and out of the way, but her have been pinned in the crash -
Gamora CLAMPS two metal switches together, MACHINE-FIRING GUN, as she walks forward.
The front of the M-ship is peppered with blasts and then EXPLODES.
The explosion causes the thin ground around it to COLLAPS and the entire ship FALLS BACKWARDS to an even LOWER LEVE BURSTING some more as it hits the ground.
Gamora gazes down at the ship.
Nebula is a mess. Her legs are broken, trapped in the shi There is a FIRE at her feet.
She struggles, trying to get out, but her machine parts a SPARKING and she can hardly breathe. It seems as she's go to die, when --
Part of the ship is TORN AWAY.    She sees Gamora.
Gamora GRABS HER, unceremoniously PULLING HER FREE, just the M-ship EXPLODES, PITCHING THEM BOTH to the ground.
They lie next to each other. Nebula COUGHS as her legs ar healing, CRACKING back into place.
She looks over and eyes Gamora.
And then she HOLLERS and attacks her.
Are you kidding me?!
They FIGHT.
Nebula snatches Gamora's blade from her, and TUMBLES on t of her as she gains the upper hand. She holds the blade above Gamora, ready to plummet it into her.
She wants to - she really does - but now that the moment here...
She SCREAMS in frustration, and falls back.
I win.
Gamora eyes her, a little surprised.
I win. I bested you in combat.
Uh, no, I just spared your life -
You were stupid enough to let me live so -
You just let me live!
I WIN!
GAMORA                      NEBULA (CONT'D)
Nebula, I really don't need      I don't need you always this. My day has been bad        trying to beat me!
I'm not the one who just flew across the universe because I wanted to win!
Don't tell me what I want!
I don't have to because you make it
YOU WERE THE ONE WHO WANTED TO WIN, I JUST WANTED A SISTER!
Gamora stops suddenly, struck.   Nebula is cracking.
You were all I had, but you were the one who needed to win! Thanos pulled my eye from my head and my brain from my skull and my arm from my body because of you!
