Gamora doesn't know what to say. Nebula is almost instant embarrassed.
They sit there for a moment, saying nothing.
The Quarters are entombed in stars. The dim sound of "BRA comes from within.
Quill lies in bed, unable to sleep, listening to the song
You all right, son?
Quill turns to see Ego in the doorway.
I saw your girl stomp off earlier in quite a huff.
Quill sits up, nods.
Yeah.
Ego sits beside him.
It's fortuitous you're listening to this song.
You know - ?
`Brandy' by Looking Glass.   A favorite of your mom's.
Yes.
One of earth's greatest musical compositions. Perhaps its very greatest.
Yeah, it is.
You and I, Peter, we're the sailor in the song.
Ego speaks along with the lyrics as they play.
He came on a summer's day, bringing gifts from far away - like the child I put in your mother, or the freedom you brought Gamora.
Quill listens.

Brandy, you're a fine girl, what a good wife you would be. But my life, my love, my lady is the sea. The sea calls the sailor back. He loves the girl, but that's not his place. The sea calls upon him as history calls upon great men, and sometimes we are deprived the pleasures of mortals.
Well, you might not be mortal, but
Death will remain a stranger to both of us as long as the light burns within the planet.
Ego smiles.
I'm immortal? That's... really?
Yes, as long as the light exists.
And I can use the light to make cool things? Like how you made all this?
It'll take thousands of years of practice before you get really good at it . But, yes.
Well, get ready for an eight hundred foot statue of Pac Man, then. With Skeletor. And Heather Locklear. I'm gonna make some weird shit.
Ego puts his arm around him, smiles kindly.
I can't wait to see your weird shit.
Wow, that...
Came out a little disgusting.
They CHUCKLE.
It is a tremendous responsibility, Peter. Only we can remake the universe. Only we can take the bridle of the cosmos and lead it where it needs to go.
How?
Ego holds up his fingers, letting forth a flame of white cosmic light. Quill holds up his fingers, letting forth a smaller, less intense flame of white cosmic light.
REVEAL MANTIS, IN THE HALL, around the corner, looking at and Quill and the light emanating from their fingers.
Come with me.
Mantis looks like she's having a panic attack.
CLOSE-UP OF DRAX, sound asleep.
Drax! Drax!
He WAKES to see a panicked Mantis sitting on the bed besi him.
Drax, we need to talk -
Ugh. I am sorry, but I like a woman with some meat on her bones.
What?
I tried to let you down easily by telling you I found you disgusting.
No! That's not what I -
Drax starts to GAG.
What are you doing?!
I'm imagining being with you physically!
Drax, that's not - I don't like you like that. I don't even like the type of thing you are.
Hey! There's no need to get personal!
Listen! Ego's gotten exactly what he wanted. I should have told you earlier, I am stupid. You are in danger.
Gamora and Nebula still sit here, quietly and awkwardly. Gamora glances down a twisting tunnel, where phosphoresce lights shine brightly.
What's that?
She moves towards it.   Nebula, hesitantly, follows.
Ego and Quill enter the palace.
You need to readjust the way you process life. Everything around us - including the girl - is temporary. We are forever.
Doesn't eternity get boring?
Not if you have a purpose, Peter. Which is why you're here. I told you how all those years ago I had an unceasing impulse to find life.
Ego is standing underneath the diorama of him facing the little alien girl.
I didn't tell you how when I did find it, it was all so... disappointing.
Gamora and Nebula move further down the cavern, stepping light, getting closer.
And that is when I came to a profound realization.
My innate desire to seek out other life was not so that I could walk among that life.
Ego looks at his son, moved by the memories.
Peter, I had found meaning.
Quill is taken aback. But Ego sets his finger lightly on forehead, and the white light bursts through his son's bo
We see THE COSMOS IN QUILL'S EYES. He looks ecstatic, far beyond where he stands, and seems to finally understand.
I see it. Eternity.
Gamora and Nebula stop, in horror.
Oh my God.
They are staring at piles and piles of skeletons of vario species, thousands of them, seeming to go on forever.
We need to get off this planet.
We see traces of the UNIVERSAL NEURAL TELEPORTATION NETWO the Quadrant a blinking light POPPING IN and OUT on a tra across the cosmos -
And then ZOOM BACK FURTHER TO THE UNIVERSE, the same blin light making its way while ROCKET, YONDU, and KRAGLIN SCR
WATCHERS swirl to the Quadrant SWISH past them and JUMPS
They turn back to STAN LEE, in a spacesuit with a fishbow helmet.
Anyway, before I was so rudely interrupted, that time I was a World War II vet -
THE QUADRANT POPS INTO SPACE, EGO'S PLANET nearby.
Yondu, Kraglin, Rocket and Groot FALL OUT OF THEIR SEATS, RETCHING, clutching their stomachs.
What the hell you doing, boy?!
I could tell by how you talked about him - this Ego is bad news. We're here to save Quill.
For what?
For `honor'? For `love'?
No! I don't care about those things! I want to save Quill so I can prove I'm better than him! I can lord this over him forever!
Yondu LAUGHS bitterly as he pulls himself up to the contr Rocket yanks himself up beside him.
What are you laughing at me for?!
You can fool yourself and everyone else but you can't fool me. I know who you are.
You don't know anything about me, loser.
I know everything about you. I know you play like the meanest and the hardest `cause you actually the most scared of all.
Shut up.
I know you steal batteries you don't need and you push away anyone who's willing to put up with you, `cause just a little bit of love reminds you how big and empty that hole inside you actually is!
I said, shut up.
I know the scientists what made you never gave a rat's ass about you -
I'm serious, dude - !
Just   like my own damn parents, who sold   me, their own little baby, into   slavery! I know who you are, boy,   because you're me.
They stare at each other there, a mirror.
What kind of pair are we?
The kind that's about to go fight a planet I reckon.
All right, okay, that's - Wait. Fight a what?
Gamora, furious, BURSTS into the room.   She sees Mantis standing with Drax.
She RUNS to her, GRABBING HER by the neck --
Hey!
And she SLAMS her against the wall.
Who are you people?! What is this place?!
What is she doing here?
Just watching the fireworks.
Gamora, let her go!
The bodies in the caverns, who are they?!
You are scared.
Gamora, whose skin is touching Mantis, lets go of her nec terrified.

The DIORAMAS all around Quill and Ego TRANSFORM into a ma the universe. Quill stares in his cosmic reverie at the PLANETS around him - thousands of them with pieces of EGO LIFEFORM - GLOWING COSMIC PLANTS - buried within them.
I call it the Expansion. It is my purpose. And now it's yours as well.
It's beautiful.
Quill stares up at a DIORAMA: Ego grabs handfuls of his o body, engulfed in light, and plants the wriggling pieces various planets.
Over thousands of years I implanted thousands of extensions of myself on thousands of worlds.
In the DIORAMAS, the COSMIC PLANTS OVERGROW and COVER eac the planets, like chocolate on a malt ball.
I needed to fulfill life's one true purpose: to grow and to spread, covering all that exists, until everything... is me.
Gamora backs away, recovering.
What did she do to me?!
She already told me everything.
I only had one problem. A single Celestial doesn't have enough power for such an enterprise. But two Celestials - well now, that just might do.
The bodies are his children.
Gamora is horrified.
On the DIORAMAS we see Ego with hundreds of species of fe aliens.
Out of all my labors the most beguiling was attempting to graft my DNA with that of another species. I hoped the result of such a coupling would be enough to power the expansion.
Yondu and Rocket walk here.
I had Yondu deliver some of them to me. It broke the Ravager code - but I compensated him generously. And, to ease his conscience, I told him I would never hurt them.

That was true. They never felt a thing. But, one after the other, they failed me. None of them had the Celestial genes. Until you, Peter. Out of all my spawn, only you have carried the connection to the light.
Peter smiles, an enchanted idiot, the cosmos in his eyes.
We need to find Peter now and get off this damn planet.
Ego will have won him to his side by now. He has a way of -
Then we just go.
No. He's our friend.
All any of you do is yell at each other. You're not friends.
You're right. We're family. We leave no one behind.
Except maybe you.
Oh my god.
For the first time in my life, I am truly not alone.
Quill suddenly looks sad.
What is it, son?
My friends.
That's the mortal in you, Peter.
Yes. I don't need that.
What are we?
Forever.
What are they?
Temporary.
You think you love them. But love is merely an evolutionary trick in the service of reproduction. We are beyond such things.
Yes.
But my mother.
Ego looks at him, questioningly.
You said you loved my mother.
That I did. My river lily, who knew the words to every song that came on the radio. I returned to earth to see her three times. I knew if I came back a fourth, I'd never leave.
The expansion, the reason for my very existence would be over. So I did what I had to do. But it broke my heart to put that tumor in her head.
Wh- what?
ZOLLY IN ON QUILL as the cosmos disappear from his eyes. Tears stream down his face.
I know that sounds bad -

head_text.subj: QUILL PULLS OUT HIS PISTOLS AND FIRES

text: THROUGH EGO, DISPERSING the MOLECULES forming his body.
Quill SHOOTS at him AGAIN and AGAIN and AGAIN. The flesh disappears from Ego like bites from a cookie, exposing th angry alien skeletal form beneath.
But, as the charge on Peter's blasters wears out, Ego jus looks at him, and, although he's filled with holes, he's merely disappointed.
Who in the hell do you think you are?
You killed my mother!
EGO TRANSFORMS into DAVID HASSELHOFF.
I tried so hard to find the form that best suited you, and this is the thanks I get?
And then, once again, BECOMES HIS USUAL FORM.
You really need to grow up.
A SPIKY COSMIC LIGHT-PROPELLED TENDRIL SHOOTS UP from the floor behind Quill, and JUTS into Quill's body.
Quill is THRUST INTO THE AIR.   He opens his mouth to SCR and WHITE LIGHT EMITS.
I wanted to do this together! But I suppose you'll have to learn by spending the next thousand years as a battery, `Star-Lord'.
THROUGH THE WINDOW to the PALACE - PAN TO Gamora watching her TRANSMITTER - the one she was trying to contact Rocke - BEEPS. She answers.
Rocket?!
Gamora follows Drax, Nebula, and a confused Mantis as the move out.
Rocket, Yondu, and Groot are CRAWLING into a huge LASER DRILL.
Keep that transmitter nearby so I can find you. We're in an old piece of construction equipment Yondu once used to slice open the Bank of A'askavaria.
Ego's unhinged -
I know. Get ready.
Drop it, Kraglin!
Kraglin YANKS a lever.
An ugly, bulbous and uneven craft PLOPS from the Quadrant and heads toward Ego's surface.
I got a plan.
What is it?
It's pretty simple.
Ego walks calmly up beside the trapped Quill. He snatches Walkman off of him. He stares at it. Quill can barely spe
NO.
EGO PRESSES PLAY. A distorted version of "Brandy" plays. stares at it - perhaps he's feeling wistful sadness, or perhaps nothing at all.
`Brandy, you're a fine girl. What a good wife you would b
`My life, my love, my lady is the sea'? Peter, THIS IS THE SEA.
EGO CRUSHES THE WALKMAN IN HIS GRIP as Quill watches helplessly.
The POWER SURGES from Quill through the TENTACLE and throughout the entire PALACE --
As Gamora, Mantis, Drax, and Nebula run toward the Palace BURSTS WITH COSMIC LIGHT, so brightly they have to protec their eyes.
EGO basks in the power and we TRAVEL down his legs --
We FOLLOW THE ENERGY THROUGH THE SURFACE OF THE PLANET --

head_text.subj: THROUGH THE TWISTING VEINS OF LIGHT BENEATH --

text: And INTO an ENORMOUS, METAL ORB, the SELF CHAMBER, which EXPLODES WITH LIGHT.
Boom.
We PUSH INTO the small plant - now a bit larger - that Eg planted at the very beginning of the film.
It LIGHTS UP and GROWS, INSTANTLY BURSTING UPWARDS -
The PLANT BURSTS UP BEHIND the Dairy Queen (now a modern a huge ORGANIC, BLOB-LIKE MASS OF LIGHT that comes down instantly on the building, CRUSHING it and everyone insid

head_text.subj: AND CONTINUING TO SPILL FORWARD, SPREADING.

text: EGO SUMMONS all his energy, when, SUDDENLY, a DOOR beside SMASHES APART.
Drax has kicked through it and Gamora, Nebula and Mantis with him. Ego turns to see them, then hears a RUMBLING ab him.
He turns to look at a window on the palace wall behind hi

head_text.subj: AND THE GIANT LASER DRILL COMES SMASHING THROUGH THE PALA

text: Hey there, Jackass.
Ego looks surprised.
The LASER DRILL lands on Ego, SQUASHING HIM.
The tendril retracts from Quill as he falls and heaves fo breath.
The cosmic plant, barreling down the street, suddenly STO
Drax, Gamora, Nebula, and Mantis rush into the crumbling palace.
The door on the side of the Laser Drill SLIDES OPEN. Baby Groot is standing there, smiling, and waving.
Out of the way, dumber, smaller Groot.
As Drax crawls in, Groot starts PUNCHING Drax as hard as can. Probably because he called him dumb, but who's to sa
Gamora helps up Quill.
I told you something didn't feel right.
`I told you so.' That's really what I need right now.
I came back, didn't I?
Because there's an unspoken thing.
There is no unspoken thing.
Drax, Mantis, Gamora, and Quill step inside the door.
What are you doing? You could have killed us all crashing in here like that!
Uh, `Thank you, Rocket'?
We had it under control.
We did not. That is only an extension of his true self. He will be back soon.
What's Smurfette doing here!?
Back rubs, dishes, killing gods, whatever I need to do to get a damn ride home.
She tried to murder me!
I saved you, you stupid fox.
He's not a fox.
I am Groot.
I'm not a raboon either!
I am Groot.
`Raccoon,' whatever!
Drax looks out the window.
TENTACLE-LIKE STRANDS BURST UP through the palace floorin all around the drill.
Drax turns to the others.
How do we kill a Celestial?
There's the center to him - his brain, his soul, whatever it is, in some sort of shell --
It's in the caverns below the surface.
Quill climbs up the ladder to see -
YONDU?
Nebula looks at Gamora.
If he's got that fin back, I am so screwed.
Yondu THRUSTS the ship upward for takeoff.   But TENTACLE wrap around the ship --
And YANK IT BACK DOWN into the floor, destroying the foundation of the palce.
Everyone FALLS forward.
Thrusters are out!
Quill starts rewiring the mechanics.
I guess I should be glad I was a skinny kid. Otherwise you would have delivered me to this maniac!
You still reckon that's the reason I kept you around, you idiot?!
That's what you told me, you old doofus!
Once I figured out what happened to them other kids, I wasn't gonna just hand you over.
You said you were gonna eat me!
That was being funny!
Not to me!!
You people have issues.
Quill sees THROUGH THE WINDSHIELD where EGO'S CREEPY SKEL is GROWING IN FRONT OF THEM.
Of course I have issues that's my fricking father!!... Thrusters are back up.
Quill thrusts the ship FORWARD instead of up.
It CRASHES through Ego and DOWN THE SLOPING FLOOR --
And OUT THROUGH the giant pane of glass at the end.

head_text.subj: I/E. LASER DRILL/CRACK IN THE PLANET

text: Everyone holds on in what's essentially the worst roller coaster drop ever.
We should be going up!
We can't. Ego wants to eradicate the universe as we know it. We have to kill him.
They PLUMMET toward a fissure in the earth below.   It's small for the ship.
Rocket!
Got it.
Rocket BLASTS the lasers perfectly, CHIPPING AWAY PIECES rock, forming an opening in the crack.
They SMASH into the opening, barely fitting, leading down into the planet.
Quill flies perfectly, TWISTING through tunnels and aroun corners.
Rocket mans the lasers, BLASTING PIECES OUT OF PLACE just time so they can SCRAPE through.
So, we're saving the galaxy again?
I guess.
Awesome. We'll really be able to jack up our prices if we're two- time-galaxy savers.
I seriously can't believe that is where your mind goes.
It was just a random thought, man! I thought we were friends!
Of course I care about the planets, and the buildings, and all of the animals on the planets.
And the people.
Meh.
Mantis GIGGLES.
The crabby puppy is so cute he makes me want to die!
Your suicidal thoughts sadden me, but your wish will likely come true.
MEANWHILE, Kraglin is mellowly hanging out, eating some s and listening to "WHAM BAM" BY SILVER as he sees somethin out in the distance of space. He looks a bit closer.

head_text.subj: SOVEREIGN OMNICRAFT ARE POPPING THROUGH JUMP POINTS ABOVE

text: AYESHA is remotely piloting one of the ships.   She looks determined and angry on the vid-screen.
And, one by one, Sovereign OMNICRAFT POP IN all around he until there is a large fleet.
Ayesha, in full pilot gear, yells into her comm.
Pilots, release envoy units!
Smaller, more nimble robotic ENVOYS, like big pods with blasters for arms - detach from the front of every Omnicr
Our sensors detect the batteries are below the surface of the planet.
Dive!
OVERHEAD SHOT: On the screens in all the pods, the envoys DIVE toward the planet from slightly different directions
Kraglin, in shock, watches the massive fleet of envoys di downward. He grabs the comm.
Uhh... Cap'n?
No answer.
Cap'n?
Yondu doesn't hear the CRACKLING SPEAKER beside him as th maneuver down through the fissure. Quill eyes him.
So why'd Ego want you here?
He needs my genetic connection to the light to help destroy the universe. He tried to teach me how to control the power.
So could you?
A little. I made a ball.
A ball?
I thought as hard as a could, that's all I could come up with.
You `thought'?
Quill nods.
You think when I make this arrow fly I use my head?
What do you use?
They look at each other instead of where they're going, a the CRASH into an overhanging piece of rock.
The entire side door is RIPPED OFF.
As the SCREECH through a smaller space and into --
The Laser Drill DROPS into this enormous open space withi the planet.
The Guardians gather on the side of the ship open to the hollow, gazing out at its stunning beauty, lit by Ego's w glow running throughout it.
Whoa.
Mantis turns, looking through the portholes on the other side.
There! Thats Ego's core.
Mantis points at the Self Chamber, down below them.   The twist down towards it.
That ore's thick. Rocket, we're gonna need to use the big laser.
Rocket nods, FLICKS switches.
All the small lasers on the sides move through grooves to combine into one huge laser in the center of the ship: th MEGA-LASER.
We must hurry. It will not take Ego long to find us.
Keep it still!
Quill steadies the craft as best he can beside the Self Chamber. But it's an unwieldy beast, built for power, not precision.
Rocket powers up the mega-laser and holds tight to the SHUDDERING CONTROLS as it DRILLS, BURNING a HOLE into the protective sheathe. It melts and drips down.
We drill into the center, we kill him.
Quill holds tight to the steering wheel. Yondu notices th BLINKING LIGHT on the comm. He taps it.
What is it, Kraglin?
Um, remember that Ayesha chick?
Yeah, why?
Yondu looks out the window where AYESHA'S SQUADRON is SWOOPING OUT OF the cracks in the ceiling all around them
Aw, hell.
Quill PULLS AWAY from the envoys.
But the Sovereign envoys start BLASTING AT THE CRAFT all once; the LASER LOSES POWER and the VEHICLE TURNS SIDEWAY
Drax, Mantis, and Gamora GO TUMBLING from the hole in the side. Nebula and Groot grab onto the floor.
Gamora, Drax, and Mantis FALL from an incredible height. LAND - ONE, TWO, THREE - WITH APLOMB.
Gamora looks up and sees the Laser Drill CURL behind the Chamber as it tries to avoid the envoys' BLASTERS.
Nebula and Groot settle as the ship rights itself and BLA PIERCE the ship around them.
Quill peers down at Rocket, who has jumped out of his sea and is pouring out the contents of his satchel.
Why aren't you firing the laser?!
They blew out the generator! I think I packed a small detonator.
A detonator is worthless without explosives!
We got these!
Rocket shows Nebula the Anulax batteries.
Quill leaves the controls to Yondu as he CLIMBS down besi Rocket, now messing with wiring on his BOMB.
Is it strong enough to kill Ego?
If it is, it will cause a chain reaction throughout his entire nervous system.
Meaning what?
The entire planet will explode. We'll have to get out of here fast. I rigged a timer.
Rocket stuffs the bomb back in his satchel.   Groot climb his back.
Rocket and Quill slap on their AERO RIGS.
Go!
The run and jump out of the laser drill, FLYING ON THEIR RIGS, avoiding the GUNFIRE.
The ZOOM towards the blast hole on the side of the self chamber.
Rocket and Quill land here, messily, TUMBLING.
Mantis is worried about something else entirely; the enti chasm begins TREMBLING and the walls start to MUTATE.
He's coming.
Didn't you say you could make him sleep?
When he wants! He's too powerful! I can't!
You don't have to believe in yourself because I believe in you.
They look ahead. They see, on the enormous wall in front them, the LIGHT-FORM of a giant EGO SCREAMING ANGRILY.
His SCREAM becomes a TUNNEL OF ROCKS RUSHING TOWARDS THEM like a train.
Mantis sees a nerve bundle on the ground coming from Ego' Core. Although afraid, she grabs it.
SLEEP!
She SCREAMS with effort and some pain as energy travels through the bundle and into the core, where it darkens.
The LIGHT LEAVES THE ROCK FORMATION and it SLAMS into the ground in front of them, SPLASHING DIRT OVER THEM.
But they are safe, shivering. Drax and Gamora look at eac other.
I never thought she'd be able to do it. With as skinny and weak as she appears to be.
Mantis's arm is TREMBLING.
I don't know how long I can hold him!
You need to, girl. If you don't keep Ego at bay, we all die.
Rocket shines a powerful PEN-LIGHT inside the cavity, exposing the interior, spattered with Swiss-cheese-like h glowing with light.
The metal is too thick! For the bomb to work we'd actually need to place it on Ego's core. And our fat butts ain't gonna fit through those tiny holes.
Well...
Quill slowly eyes Groot, who is playing with a leaf on hi arm and thinking about something else entirely.
That's a terrible idea.
Which is the only kind of idea we got left.
Rocket SIGHS. He puts Groot on his back and MOVES with Gr deeper into the blast hole, mumbling to himself:
Unbelievable. `Rocket, do this. Rocket, do that.'
Quill turns toward the opening. PUSH UP AND IN ON QUILL.
Uh, what a day.
He jumps out into the fray.

Quill FLIES UP as a ship FLIES in toward him BLASTING, an he's about to fire back. MAN VS. SPACESHIP. This is most likely the beginning of the biggest, baddest fight scene ever, but instead we CUT TO -
Quiet. Blasts in the deep background. Rocket places a tin bomb in front of Groot. It is a small, simple device with two switches and two buttons. He explains, very carefully

All right. First you flick this switch, then this switch. That activates it. And then you push this button, which will give you five minutes to get out of there. Whatever you do don't push this button, because that will set off the bomb immediately, and we'll all be dead. Now repeat back what I just said.
I am Groot.
Uh huh.
I am Groot.
That's right.
I am Groot.
No! That's the button that will kill everyone! Try again.
Groot thinks.
I am Groot.
Rocket nods.
I am Groot.
Rocket nods.
I am Groot.
No! That's exactly what you just said! How is that even possible?! Which button is the button you're supposed to push?! Point to it.
Groot thinks. And he points to the one that will kill everyone.
NO!!!
Hey, you're making him nervous!
Rocket runs to see, at the end of the hole, a sliver of t outside as Quill peeks in while SHOOTING at envoys.
Shut up! And give me some tape! Does anyone have any tape out there!? I want to put some tape over the death button!
I don't have any tape.    Let me check.
Quill disappears from the hole.    As Rocket waits, he he amongst the chaos, faintly -
Yo, Yondu, do you have any - ow! - do you have any tape?!
We hear VOICES GRUMBLING.
Rocket and Groot look around, waiting. Rocket is impatien He coughs. Groot is like a bored kid in a waiting room. H shifts around and plays with the wires on the bomb.
Quill reappears outside the hole, SHOOTING an envoy.
No one has any tape.
Not a single person has tape?
You have priceless batteries and an atomic bomb in your bag! If anyone had tape it would be you!
That's exactly my point! I have to do everything!
Dude, you're wasting time!
Rocket turns back to Groot, who has already taken the bom and is heading towards the hole.
He makes a "WHEEEEEE" sound and smiles brightly as he HOP into the hole and SLIDES down as if on a water slide.
Rocket, heavy-lidded, watches him go.
We're all gonna die.
Yondu and Nebula, in the cockpit, are being overcome as blasts come through the walls.
We're done for without the generator.
Nebula MOANS, frustrated. She flips open a section of the dashboard, then a part of her arm.
The remaining Sovereign envoys have ENCIRCLED the battere Laser Drill, BLASTING IT TO BITS.
Quill FLIES into the Laser Drill, SLAMMING into the wall.
Guardians! Perhaps it will provide you solace that your deaths are not without purpose.
Nebula is feeding the wires from the craft into her mechanical arm.
The actual Ayesha, fitted with the pilot gear, looks at t Laser Drill on the screen.
They will serve as a warning to all of those tempted with betraying us; don't screw with the Sovereign.
Yondu works some switches: The LASERS slide back into the slots all over the ship.
This is gonna hurt.
Promises, promises.
Yondu flips ALL the switches; ALL THE POWER RUNS PAINFULL

head_text.subj: OUT OF NEBULA'S BODY INTO THE VEHICLE --
AND THE LASERS BEAM OUT OF THE SHIP IN ALL DIRECTIONS AT

text: ONCE, like a dangerous disco ball, slicing through almost nearly every single ENVOY.
A BEAM ALMOST HITS Drax, but he LEAPS out of the way. Smo rises from a hole in the ground between him and Mantis.
Hey!
With flair, Yondu spins the pilot's wheel, so that the wh rig REVOLVES.
Ayesha looks on, in horror as the BEAMS SLICE THROUGH the remaining CRAFT - and one is COMING HER WAY.
NO!!
Ayesha SITS BACK. She looks around her at the other pods: of them are down.
NO! NOOOOO!!
Quill sees FLAMING CHUNKS FLY into the rig...
And FIRE SPILLING toward the ship's engine, dripping fuel
We're gonna blow!
Yondu WHISTLES as the FLAMES HIT THE FUEL -
Gamora watches as the ENTIRE LASER DRILL EXPLODES.   She stricken.
Peter?
She sees a tiny body flying from the ship - it's Nebula, LANDS across from her on her feet.
Gamora looks at her, worried. Nebula gives her what might a little smile, and looks upward. Gamora follows her line sight.
Quill is FLYING FROM THE EXPLOSION on his aero-rig. Yondu holding onto a flying arrow: his one arm up straight, his heels touching. Quill looks at him and SNICKERS.
What?
You look like Mary Poppins.
Is he cool?
Quill looks at the man who raised him. He smiles.
Yeah. He's cool.
Yondu looks out at the Guardians as he comes in for a landing.
I'm Mary Poppins, y'all!
Quill and Yondu LAND beside Nebula. Gamora sees Quill and MARCHES TOWARD HIM.
The CAMERA CIRCLES GAMORA AND QUILL, FIERY SHIP FRAGMENTS RAINING DOWN AROUND THEM IN SLOW-MOTION, as if this is th greatest heavy metal video of all time.
The other Guardians enter, one by one - Nebula, Drax, Yon Rocket FLYING DOWN on his aero-rig, and finally, Mantis, staring forward with concentration until --

head_text.subj: A HUGE CHUNK OF SPACESHIP FLIES IN FROM THE SIDE, FLATTEN

text: MANTIS. The others all look down at her in shock.
Oh. Wow.
Mantis, UNCONSCIOUS BENEATH a ship fragment, has lost hol Ego.

head_text.subj: THE ENTIRE HOLLOW AROUND THEM BEGINS TO RUMBLE. THE GRO

text: AND WALLS THEMSELVES SHIFT and WAVER.
The whole cavity is alive. Drax checks on Mantis.
She's just unconscious.
Groot RUNS and HOPS through the tunnels. He comes to a crossroads.
He sees a COSMIC LIGHT emanating from one tunnel.   He da off toward it.
How long before the bomb goes off?
In the unlikely event Groot doesn't kill us all, about six minutes.
Yondu speaks into the comm on his lapel.
Kraglin.
Kraglin, NODDING OUT, abruptly wakes.
We need the Quadrant for extraction in T-minus five minutes.
Aye, Cap'n!
Our heroes peer up to see the SURFACE OF THE PLANET UNFOL ABOVE THEM, so that THE BRIGHT SKY SHINES THROUGH.
Someone needs to be up top when Kraglin arrives. Drax, take Mantis.
Drax nods. He picks up Mantis. Quill grabs the aero-rig o himself and SLAPS it on Drax's back, which AUTOMATICALLY WRAPS around his upper body.
Ahhh! My nipples!
He FLIES UPWARD.
The ground around them SPLITS INTO ENORMOUS CRACKS. Gamor sees a CRACK IN THE EARTH RUSHING TOWARD her and Quill, a she turns toward him.
And Gamora's side CRUMBLES AWAY, GAMORA FALLING DOWN with
Gamora!!
HUGE BURSTS OF EARTH SHOOT UP all around Drax, Yondu, Roc and Quill.
The planet has formed GIANT TENTACLES THAT HURTLE towards heroes.
Gamora is PLUMMETING, seemingly to her death, when she lo over and sees Nebula FALLING just behind her.
Nebula grabs Gamora's arm and then grabs onto a passing cliff.
They SNAP TO A STOP- OW! - hanging down off the side.
Nebula tosses Gamora up onto a flat surface.
As Nebula climbs up after her, Gamora looks at her, wary surprised by this beneficence.
Oh, get over it.
Quill BLASTS a tentacle.
Yondu WHISTLES, the ARROW WEAVING THROUGH TENTACLES aroun them.
Rocket TOSSES a bunch of tiny bombs at some, which they s to and EXPLODE.
But they are by no means winning this fight.
The giant Quadrant LOWERS toward the surface.
Gamora looks at Nebula.
We have to get up to the extraction point!
They look over the edge and see a huge RIFT OF LAND RISIN QUICKLY. They look at each other and JUMP -
They GRAB ONTO THE EDGE of the rising rift, CLUTCHING TO as it FLIES upward toward the open space above them.
Drax FLIES UP onto the surface; he sees the Quadrant wait for him there. He DARTS for the ship.
Kraglin opens the LOADING DOOR
But huge swatches of the planet reach up and GRAB onto th Quadrant, YANKING IT DOWN.
Kraglin, freaking out, throws the thrusters into high gea
The thrusters FLARE as the massive ship STRUGGLES to free itself from Ego's tendrils.
And it does PULL ITSELF UP for a moment, but the tendrils tighten, SLAMMING it back down.
The whole Quadrant starts to TIP OVER. Kraglin falls down against the side of the ship.
Drax sees the ship FALLING TOWARDS HIM and he RUNS away f it in fear.
But he arrives a the edge of a cliff. He crouches as the ship CONTINUES DOWN toward him, about to SQUASH both he a
But Kraglin heroically CRAWLS his way back up to the cont as he dangles from them. He pushes on the thrusters, so t the ship goes back upright.
Drax turns and again RUNS toward the Quadrant.
Gamora and Nebula are still rising on the rift when they into a wall near the opening in the surface of the planet
Quill turns and sees Ego, in his terrifying SKELETAL LIGH FORM, STROLLING DOWN TOWARDS HIM as the land around him P LIKE THE RED SEA.
As Ego walks, THE DIRT AND MOLECULES AROUND EGO FORM ORGA IN HIS BODY, piecing himself back together.
Quill sees a tentacle SLAM Yondu to the ground and COVER ENTIRE BODY.
He turns to see Rocket HOLLERING as he FIRES at tentacles but they OVERWHELM him.
The earth WRAPS AROUND Drax's legs like quicksand, pullin him and Mantis down into it.
Gamora and Nebula scramble, trying to CLIMB BACK UP, when TENDRILS WRAP AROUND THEM, stopping them from going furth
The walls are tightening around Groot. He grows his branc to try to stop them, but they aren't working.
He begins to CRY, like an actual baby, terrified, on the brink of suffocating.
Ego approaches his son. He is fully formed, and he is mor truly "himself." Alien. Dark eyes and pale skin.
I told you I don't want to do this alone.
You cannot deny the purpose the universe has bestowed upon you!
And once again, the LIGHT TENDRILS STAB THROUGH QUILL'S B thrusting him to his knees.
Smaller light tendrils stab into his face and body.
And we see the LIGHT being sucked out of Quill and up int the Self Chamber once more as it BURSTS WITH LIGHT.
POLICE OFFICERS and bystanders are in the streets, snappi phone photos, etc, beside the HUGE, STILL SWATCH OF EGO'S LIFEFORM.
Please, everyone. Step back. I need you all to clear the -
What is that?
The LIFEFORM ALIGHTS WITH ENERGY and MOVES again, SPILLIN INCREDIBLY QUICKLY towards them.
People abandon their cars in traffic as it RUNS OVER THEM
A WOMAN FALLS. People TRAMPLE around her.
But an old man's hands reach in, helping her up.
REVEAL GRANDPA QUILL, in his 70's or 80's now.
Come on, ma'am.
He HELPS the woman into an SUV.
He SLAMS on the gas, SCREECHING AWAY from the enormous ti wave of organic light.
EGO'S LIFEFORM smashes down the PARK WALLS and into the street.
(O.S) It doesn't need to be like this
Ego approaches his son.
Why are you destroying our chance?!
AAKONS run from a giant wave behind them.
(O.S) Stop pretending you aren't, what you are!
KREE MONKS run from the cosmic flesh as it pours down the hillside behind them.
But it's too fast, RUSHING OVER THEM.
THOUSANDS OF ORLONI are darting in fear across this dusty desert, as it WASHES OVER them.
(O.S) One in billions..
THREE HURCTARIANS run, SCREAMING.
(O.S) Trillions, even more!
AN EASIK MOTHER clutches her BABY, covering it with her o body, as the spreading lifeform LOOMS UP behind her.
She closes her eyes and waits for the worst.
Quill looks up at Ego, barely able to focus, as the molec form skin over the muscle and skeleton and innards beneat
What greater meaning could life possibly have to offer?!
Yondu struggles beneath the tentacle beside Quill.
I don't use my head to fly the arrow, boy! I use my h -
Quill hears this as the earth COVERS Yondu's face.
Quill LOOKS INWARD. And suddenly, everything becomes...
Tears come to Peter Quill's eyes as he remember those aro him and what they mean to him. And we see his MEMORIES.

head_text.subj: MUSIC ON THE WALKMAN TOGETHER, EACH WITH ONE EAR PIECE.
THE FIRST TIME, SMILING AS THE AIR RUSHES THROUGH THEIR H
BABY GROOT CLUTCHES HAPPILY ONTO QUILL'S BACK.
PETER'S ARM AS HE TEACHES HIM HOW TO SHOOT.

text: Quill looks back up at Ego as we HEAR the gentle chords o FLEETWOOD MAC'S "THE CHAIN" starts echoing throughout the hollow.
He clutches his fist and we see the light growing within
Bits of earth begin to ROLL UP AND SCRAMBLE AND SWIRL aro Quill's body, his arms, his legs, as if he's pulling them towards himself with magnets.
And Ego looks confused, as the GROUND QUAKES AROUND HIM.
Quill glares at his father, his voice distorting with Celestial thunder.
You shouldn't have killed my mom and squished my walkman.
Ahd a SOLID TORNADO OF EARTH PROPELS QUILL FORWARD. Ego tries to protect himself as Quill SLAMS into him, FLYING
Quill raises his fist, NOW A GIANT CLUB.   And he SMASHES
As Ego loses his concentration --
A pair of arms are protruding from the surface of the pla still holding Mantis aloft.
The earth falls away, and Drax, who was entirely covered, heaves for breath.
The TENDRILS FALL, freeing Gamora and Nebula as they GASP
Yondu BREAKS THROUGH THE ROCKS around him, drawing in bre
The TENTACLES HOLDING ROCKET ALOFT CRUMBLE, and he looks around, confused.
The WAVE PUSHES UP against the back of Grandpa Quill's CA and suddenly STOPS:
the mountainous plant, a hundred stories high, is up agai the back of the car.
The Easik Mother clutching her baby looks behind her; the wave has stopped.
She clutches her baby to her chest, relieved.
The tunnel around Groot SNAPS BACK to what it was. Once m he can see the light at the tunnel's end, and one looks l a GIANT BRAIN composed of prismatic light.
He RUNS forward.
Rocket flies up and yells at Groot.
Groot! Groot, if you can can hear me, hurry up - I'm not sure how long Quill can keep him distracted!
Groot ARRIVES at the end of the tunnel, and stops there.
The center of the core holds a huge cosmic placenta, and, within that, EGO'S TRUE SELF, the COSMIC BRAIN. It ROILS FURIOUSLY, the reflection of its fight with Quill, thrash around within this womb.
Although afraid, Groot places the bomb on the placenta.
Groot stares at both buttons, scared - he doesn't know wh one to pick.
Groot makes a decision on which button to press. He goes push the death button.
Then his finger STOPS just millimeters from the button, TREMBLING. He thinks...
And then changes the course of his finger, PUSHING THE CORRECT BUTTON.
Baby Groot turns, terrified, and RUNS.
Drax moves with Mantis into the loading bay.    He throws down and climbs up a ladder.
THE CAMERA SWINGS TO GAMORA AND NEBULA, climbing up to th surface in the dirt storm.
Ego RISES on his own MOLECULAR TORNADO and STRIKES BACK a Quill. He YELLS as he SLAMS Quill against the wall, DRAGG his face along the wall.
He TOSSES Quill into a another wall.
QUILL brings his ARM FILLED WITH LIGHT away from the wall that he causes a WAVE OF LIGHT AND ROCK around the interi of the hollow, FLYING TO EGO and knocking him aside.
Yondu protects his face as DIRT SWIRLS in the wake of the Quill/Ego battle.
Rocket, carrying Groot, FLIES BACK DOWN beside him.
Yondu! We're about to blow!
Get to the ship.
Not without Quill.
You gotta take care of the twig.
Not without you.
I ain't done nothing right my whole damn life, rat. You need to give me this.
Rocket, hesitantly, nods.    He grabs some things from hi He hands them to Yondu.
A space suit and an aero rig. I only have one of each.
Yondu nods. Rocket nods too.
Rocket starts to go, but STOPS and looks at Yondu.
He wants to say something, but he doesn't know what. Baby Groot does.
I am Groot.
What's that?
He says welcome to the frickin' Guardians of the Galaxy... only he didn't use `frickin'.
Bye, twig.
Groot waves.
And Rocket FLIES UP toward the surface. Rocket mutters to Groot.
We're gonna need to have a discussion about your language.
Ego SLAMS Quill back against a wall. Ego pulls the huge r away from the wall, FLYING THEM TOWARDS HIM and BATTERING THERE.
Ego and Quill FLY TOWARDS each other.
Ego uses the LIGHT TO BRING ROCKS TO HIS BODY, forming a giant AVATAR OF HIMSELF.
Quill brings YELLOW ROCKS to his body, forming a GIANT PA MAN.
Ego's form flies into Pac-Man's mouth, so hard there's a SONIC BOOM.
They fall, TUMBLING, still striking one another on the wa down.
They LAND HARD.
The timer counts down.    A minute left.
Gamora and Nebula are caring for Mantis as Rocket and Gro ARRIVE.
Where's Peter?
Rocket doesn't answer. Or he can't answer.
Rocket, where is he?!
Rocket looks down at a timer in his hand. The time is alm there.
Rocket?! Rocket, look at me! Where is he?!
Rocket just shakes his head a little.
But Groot points sadly outside.
I'm not leaving without him.
Gamora hardens. She stands and SNATCHES A RIFLE off the w She COCKS IT.
She STARTS OUT the bay door --
When AN ELECTRICAL BLAST HITS HER from behind.
She FALLS OVER, unconscious, REVEALING Rocket with his gu
I'm sorry. I can only afford to lose one friend today.
Kraglin, GO!
Drax looks uncertain as Kraglin presses thrust.
Wait. Is Quill back?
Rocket, where's Quill?!
Rocket looks sadly out the bay door as it CLOSES; Drax's voice echoes on his comm.
251             Where's Quill?! WHERE'S QUILL?!
Quill and Ego are exhausted, on their knees and leaning against one another like boxers after too many rounds.
The timer reads 00:26 seconds
Ego reaches for the core..
No, we need to stop it!
Quill throws him to the ground. But Ego comes back up, grasping his son's jacket, pleading with him now.
Listen to me! You are a god! If you kill me, you'll just be like everyone else!
What's so wrong with that?
Ego looks at his son, scared.
The countdown reaches zero.    The brain EXPLODES.
The explosion causes the life forces to BURST THROUGH THE ENTIRE PLANET.
Everything around Quill is EXPLODING.
He looks down at his hands, where the glow FADES and DISAPPEARS.
He gazes up at the mammoth walls around him as they BLOW and COLLAPSE.
He lowers at head, at peace with the death that's coming, when, from the side, through the debris --

head_text.subj: YONDU IS FLYING TOWARDS HIM ON AN AERO-RIG.

text: Yondu GRABS him, almost a tackle, really, LIFTING HIM up FLYING AWAY.
As Yondu and Quill FLY UPWARD, the planet EXPLODES behind them, flames licking their heels, huge stretches of the planet caving in.
Yondu holds a surprised Quill as they SOAR up into the sk
He may have been your father, boy. But he wasn't your daddy.
What?
I'm sorry I didn't do it right. I'm damn lucky you're my boy.
Quill is touched.
Yondu SLAPS the SPACESUIT disk onto Quill; THE SHIMMERY SHEATHE COVERS HIM.
What?
Yondu breathes out as completely as he can, emptying his lungs. And they EXIT THE PLANET'S ATMOSPHERE, bursting in
Quill struggles to get free, but Yondu holds him there, trapping him, but it is also an embrace. The ENTIRE PLANE COLLAPSING BEHIND THEM.
Yondu, you can't! What are you doing? What are you doing?!
Yondu's jet pack expires its supply of fuel, and they STO THERE, in space, FLOATING.
Yondu's grip weakens. Quill turns to face him.
Yondu. Yondu, no!
Yondu grabs his son's face with both hands, looking and touching him with love.
No.
And Yondu's FACE EXPANDS and his BODY GOES LIMP as he DIE there. And he starts to DRIFT AWAY. Quill grabs onto his shirt. He is CRYING.
No!
And, suddenly, behind Quill, Rocket and Drax PROPEL themselves toward him in aero-rigs, GRABBING him.
Yondu's body lies on a plank here: Various colored cloths laid in strips over his body and face, yaro lilies beneat him, red-fired pyres and Yondu's toys all around.
Rocket, Groot, Drax, Gamora, Mantis, and Kraglin surround table. Quill is at the head. He has to say a few words. B it is not easy.
The other day I told Gamora how I used to pretend my dad was David Hasselhoff.
Rocket and Drax exchange a look.
He's a singer and actor from earth... a really famous guy.
Drax nods.

And, you know, today it struck me. Yondu didn't have a talking car, but he did have a flying arrow. And he didn't have the voice of an angel, but he did have the whistle of one. And both David Hasselhoff and Yondu went on kickass adventures, and hooked up with hot women, and fought robots.
So, the thing is, David Hasselhoff kinda did end up being my Dad after all, only he was Yondu. I had a pretty cool Dad.
Quill starts to break down.
And what I'm trying to say here is, that thing you're searching for your whole life, sometimes it's right there by your side all along and you don't even know it.
Gamora sees Nebula, watching from a darkened doorway, bef she turns and walks away. She moves after her.
Groot looks up at an upset Rocket.
I am Groot?
Yeah. That's the friend I was talking about.
I am Groot.
He did call you `twig.'
Gamora catches up to Nebula in the hall.
Nebula.
Nebula turns toward her, but she doesn't look her in the
I was just a child. Like you. I was concerned with staying alive until the next day - every day. And I never considered what Thanos was doing to you. I am sorry.
Nebula nods.
I'm trying to make it right, everything I did.
There are little girls like you were - little boys - all over the universe - who are in danger. You can stay with us, and help them.
I'll help them by killing Thanos.
I don't know if that's possible.
Nebula shrugs: maybe. She turns to leave. But Gamora grab her, perhaps too roughly. Nebula turns, ready to snap.
And Gamora EMBRACES her. Nebula does not know how to reac
You'll always be my sister.
Tears well in Nebula's eyes and, for just a moment, she embraces her sister back with one hand...
Before pushing her away and leaving.
The Guardians lift Yondu on the plank. A bulbous and rust crematory is at the center of the room. It doesn't burn w fire, but a SWIRLING, VIBRANT COSMIC ENERGY.
They SLIDE YONDU IN as they watch with sadness and respec his body is enveloped by the sparkling colors. Quill clos the door on the crematory.
As Quill moves away, Kraglin approaches.
Pete.
Quill turns toward him. He's holding something.
Cap'n found this for you in a junker shop. Said someday you'd come back to the fold.
Kraglin puts an MP3 player in his hand.
It's called a Zune - what everyone listens to on earth nowadays. It's got three hundred songs.
Quill nods, touched.
Wait.
Quill holds out Yondu's arrow.   Kraglin's lip trembles.
Rocket grabbed the pieces and reassembled them. I think Yondu would want you to have it.
Thank you... Cap'n.
Yondu's SPARKLING ASHES ARE BLOWN OUT IN SPURTS FROM THE CREMATORY INTO SPACE.
Rocket, Drax, and Mantis are here, watching Yondu's ashes the vacuum of space, SWIRLING almost magically.
Quill sits down on the bed in Yondu's quarters.   He scro through selections on the Zune.
He comes to "FATHER AND SON" by CAT STEVENS.
He PRESSES PLAY.
He listens. As he does, Groot crawls up onto the bed, and then onto his lap.
Quill offers him one of the ear buds.
Groot holds it against his ear, amazed by the clarity of sound. Quill watches him, hearing the beauty of the song through Groot's face than the music itself.
And they sit there together, listening to the music, a ne father and son.
Nebula FLIES AWAY, sad, perhaps regretful, but forcing he chin up to brace against what's to come.
Gamora watches, THROUGH A WINDOW, as Nebula leaves.
Rocket sees something by the ashes.   His eyes alight.
They came.
Groot sees COLORFUL FLASHING LIGHTS out of the window. pulls on Quill's shirt to show him.
They go to get a better view.
Drax and Rocket see Yondu's COSMIC ASHES PULSING AND SWIR out in space as, one by one, enormous RAVAGER SHIPS arriv around them.
They each FLASH SPECIFIC LIGHT SEQUENCES - and, with all ships together - it looks like fireworks.
What is it?
I sent word to Yondu's old Ravager buddies and told them what he did.
Quill comes up behind them with Groot, just as Gamora ent Quill smiles.
It's a Ravager funeral.
Kraglin sees it from here. He SCREAMS with joy, and he sl his fist twice against his chest, a Ravager salute.
STAKAR and Martinex watch him there, moved.
He didn't let us down after all, Cap'n.
No, he did not, son. He did not.
CHARLIE-27, an enormous man, is wistful as he salutes.
Fare thee well, old friend.
ALETA is here, tears in her eyes, alcohol in her hand, an FEMALE RAVAGER CREW around her.
See you in the stars, Yondu Udonta.
And the Guardians all watch, enchanted by the majesty.
He didn't chase `em away.
No.
Even though he yelled at `em.
Quill shakes his head.
And was always mean.
Quill shakes his head.
And he stole batteries he didn't need.
Quill is surprised - what? And then he looks at Rocket, a little animal who doesn't know the rules of how to be any more than a young boy whose tribe sold him into slavery.
Of course not.
Baby Groot is on Gamora's shoulder. He reaches for Drax, takes him. Baby Groot YAWNS and nuzzles into Drax's shoulder, falling asleep. Drax lovingly pats his back.
Gamora looks at Drax and Groot, and Rocket, and Mantis, taking it all in, this strange family of hers. She turns Quill, staring at him with love.
What?
It's just some unspoken thing.
Quill wraps his arm around her and she sinks into him.
Mantis smiles and becomes teary and GASPS, overwhelmed, a she looks out the window.
It's beautiful.
It is. And so are you.
On the inside.
They turn back to the window and they stand there togethe our Guardians of the Galaxy, watching the Ravager funeral the colorful dust of an old friend dance.
And the shape of the dust seems to form something very cl to an ARROW.
Rocket sees this and he cries.
SURRENDER is PLAYING HERE. Kraglin has had a version of Yondu's fin implanted in his head. He looks nervously dow at the arrow on the floor.
He tries to WHISTLE. It just flips around like a dead fis
He WHISTLES again, and it FLIES UP, hitting a wall, and f back down again.
He WHISTLES again, and it ZIPS AWAY.   We HEAR A SCREAM.
Kraglin looks around the corner where Drax is sitting, th ARROW IMPALED in his chest, yelling in agony.
Kraglin looks around, hoping no one saw him there, and he tries to slink away.
MORE CREDITS as SURRENDER CHORUS KICKS IN: Mommy's all ri Daddy's all right, they just seem a little weird.
Stakar looks sad, serious.
It's a shame it takes a tragedy like losing Yondu to bring us all back together. But I think he'd be proud if he knew we were working as a team again.
Over Stakar we see this incredibly motley crew - MARTINEX CHARLIE-27, ALETA, who is holding MAINFRAME (a robotic he in a cage), and the mouthless, wormlike KRUGARR,
What say we steal some shit?
In.
Dope.
I MISSED you guys!
Krugarr makes a hex symbol and TWO COLORFUL THUMBS-UP BUR in front of him.
Hell. Yes.
Ayesha sits on a bench, brooding, disheveled and still furious. The Chambermaid cautiously approaches.
High Priestess, the Council is waiting.
They are perturbed I have wasted our resources.
The Chambermaid smiles politely, nods slightly, agreeing circumspect manner. Ayesha stares across the way.
When they see what I have created here, their wrath will dissipate, though it will be some time.
The Chambermaid looks where Ayesha is looking.
That is not just another birthing pod, ma'am?
That, my child, is the next step in our evolution: more powerful, more beautiful, and more capable of destroying the Guardians of the Galaxy.
A large, human-sized cocoon stands where Ayesha stares.
I think I shall call him... `Adam'.
Quill is standing in the bedroom doorway, looking down.
Dude, seriously, you got to clean up your room. It's a complete mess.
We REVEAL a gawky ADOLESCENT GROOT, hunched over, playing video game, in this very messy room.
I am Groot.
I'm not boring, man. You're boring. Once I got stuck on a planet where everyone was just lines and dots. I had to use geometry to get out of prison. Is that boring?
Adolescent Groot shakes his head in disdain.
You know what's boring? Not doing the dishes. What's boring is me tripping over your vines everywhere.
Adolescent Groot SIGHS.
Drax and I switched pants in the middle of that party last weekend. For no reason other than we're awesome and very much not boring.
Quill starts to walk away then comes back.
Once I got a venereal disease that made me float for three days... Don't tell Gamora... it's dormant, but... If that's boring then, I guess I'm boring.
He looks at him.
I'm not boring.
Groot ROLLS HIS EYES and makes an exasperated sound.
What's boring is when you roll your eyes like that at me and make an exasperated sound like I'm an old, boring, stupid idiot.
Quill thinks.
Now I know how Yondu felt.
Quill begins to CRY.
Yondu.
